pros: Pros: Perfect interface for small or big events. Easy, fast, convenient process. Less hassle. You can create your own event or RSVP any invitation sent to you. Give it a try. you will love it. Just sit back at your home or office, and get things done.
cons: Cons: It does what you need it for. You may get charged but they gotta keep things going , you know.

title: Booking made easy
name: Ravi G.
pros: Pros: It was easy to use, confirmation emails and additional information was great. No problem booking events i have attended and it was also used when i did recently volunteering at a school so i know it's a trusted company.
cons: Cons: I saw conflicting dates when trying to book an event. Turns out it was the events issue so i can't really blame Eventbrite

title: Eventbrite
name: Mike L.
pros: Pros: The best way to collect registrations for an event - you can use this product for events where you sell registration/tickets or even events that are free and you just need a head count. This is such an easy product to use and the end result is so professional and polished. It's a reputable name/company so people don't feel uncomfortable providing their payment info and I think it actually improves our attendance at events.
cons: Cons: I truly don't feel there are any cons for this product. It's great and the website has a great FAQ page that really helps in addition to a very attentive customer service team.

title: Great Tool for Events
name: Ashley N.
pros: Pros: I absolutely love using Eventbrite because it integrates with our CRM (NeonCRM) and is a great tool to use when publicizing events. I love that the donor has the option to absorb credit card and transaction feeds
cons: Cons: It can take a while to receive checks if you do not opt in for their direct deposit. Other than that, I don't have any complaints!

title: Great for free pop up events
name: ERIC Y.
comments: Comments: I used it for a last minute event to broadcast the event
pros: Pros: Ease of use for customers to "buy" tickets, list events and different types of entry , because it is widely used I was able to get my message out easily,
cons: Cons: Limits on notification scheme , found it difficult to update after I had already created the event. Found it confiusing to alter the event after people started signing up

title: Perfect Event Tool
name: Amy G.
pros: Pros: It's very easy to offer invitations to our clients for events using their services.
cons: Cons: It can be a bit costly when it comes to certain event types that we do so we have to plan for the event to be big enough to get a return.
overall: Overall: Eventbrite is used for our networking events and launch events. It's been quite a friendly tool for the consumers, making it easy for us to invite others, charge, or even offer free one time promo codes. It's pretty vital for hosting an event. Doing a normal list outside of this would be very time consuming.

title: An absolute must have
name: Maricel H.
pros: Pros: This is so easy and effective for marketing.
cons: Cons: It only takes a minute to figure it out and it's time well spent.

title: Great way to get your events out there!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros:
Pros: Ease of use

Creating events with multiple dates

Connecting with facebook/FB events

Ability to post events at different locations
cons: Cons: No affiliate codes can be used when creating events with multiple dates - would be great if they fixed this!
overall: Overall: Great experience - we've been using them for years for our classes for kids and adults.

title: EventBrite is a great place to get rolling with your event.
name: Dany H.
pros: Pros: If you're going to put on an event and don't have a ton of time and resources to promote and process the event, EventBrite makes it easy and efficient for you to do it. They provide all the tools necessary in a very user friendly IU.
cons: Cons: I think that the ability to customize the feel and look of your events page would make EventBrite much better.

title: Easy to use for big events
name: Tahleah B.
pros: Pros: It's easy to use if you are hosting a large event. It takes away the overwhelming responsibility of personally keeping track of attendees and payments (if applicable). This app assists with organization and creates ease.
cons: Cons: I do not like the spam emails received as a user after attending an event. But it's an easy fix with unsubscribing.

title: Quick and generally easy
name: Kirsten M.
pros: Pros: When your auto-fill is on, it's super easy to register for an event. Overall, it's easy to get a high level view of an event, and register, which matters most.
cons: Cons: Sometimes you have to dig a little to find "additional details". Would be great if this was easier to access and of the format of descriptions was more consistent.

title: Eventbrite shows what is going on anywhere
name: Ryan C.
pros: Pros: It is well know. Most tech savvy people have heard of eventbrite. It is found integrated in some well know apps. It also is standalone. Either way you can find out what is going on locally or anywhere really. Since it is well known, there are a lot of listings usually in a semi populated area. The app or website is very easy to navigate and listing events is a breeze as well. As a host of an event, you can integrate payment for tickets and issue them digitally. There are a lot of benefits to letting Eventbrite manage your event.
cons: Cons: The fees are a little steep in some places, but you are gaining convenience in return.

title: Great ticketing platform for any size event
name: Shelby K.
comments: Comments: If you want a simple ticketing platform for your event of any size Eventbrite is a great tool.
pros: Pros: Easy to use platform with the ability to customize your ticketing needs and reservation management. Works great for for free and paid for events.
cons: Cons: I have not come across any cons after using the service as an end user and organizer. The platform has come a long way.

title: Great Borrowed Platform to Promote Events
name: Tara H.
position: Marketing Coordinator & Corporate Social Responsibility Officer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is free or inexpensive to use to promote events, big or small. They also tap into their network of users to promote and share your event. Built-in promotion is always a plus.
cons: Cons: Some roadblocks as far as canceling events and notification.
overall: Overall: Great beginner resource. Almost akin to MailChimp for email.

title: Great for easy ticket sales and info
name: Stephanie M.
pros: Pros: It is really easy to use, both for setting up an event, and for people who want to go to the event. I have gotten many complements on how simple it was to get the information and tickets.
cons: Cons: I don't have any complaints about this software. It has always been very reliable.
overall: Overall: The Eventbrite website is easy to navigate and use. As an events coordinator for the Society of Children's Book Writers and Illustrators for the UK, I ran several events across the UK each month from small events such as author talks and workshops, to annual conferences with hundreds of attendees. In the whole time I was responsible for our events, I never had any problems with Eventbrite. It was easy for me to use, giving me step by step choices in setting up event info and tickets. Our attendees often commented on how easy it was to find events and book event tickets. The site also makes it easy to look for other similar events near you, or in a specific month, or week.

title: I don't know what I would do without eventbrite
name: Troy O.
pros: Pros: There are so many options and they are not trying to push you to use the paid features. I think that will naturally come as users have more and more successful events. We use this for large scale events, and I use it for little side projects as well. Highly recommended.
cons: Cons: Its almost too robust if you are doing a simple event. It takes a time commitment to get something up and looking good.
overall: Overall: This makes event setup easy, and they aren't trying to break the bank.

title: Generally a decent enough service
name: Martin S.
pros: Pros: They are kind of like Stubhub in the sense that they have accumulated a very wide, impressive range of events. The layout is also sharp and simple. I'm mostly just a fan of Ticketfly, which is a great ticket seller.
cons: Cons: The searching part can be improved, as it isn't always easy to find specific events, especially if they aren't concerts.

title: Awesome e-vite tool!
name: Mansoor N.
pros: Pros: Absolutely loved everything about it! We used it to send out our wedding invitations. Everything including the directions and the map with the gps link was right in the invite.
cons: Cons: I don't remember facing with any issues with it - the interface does take a little time to get used to and you need to play aroundto see where everything is.

title: Good way to gather attendees for your event
name: Jenn Z.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite makes it easy to set up an event and sell tickets. Their fees are a bit more than if you accepted payments yourself, even through a credit card processing company, but overall, they're generally reasonable. Since Eventbrite is also searchable, it can expand your event's audience as well.
cons: Cons: It isn't set up to create more complicated event ticketing, such as selling group tables at a charity gala. That's not really what it's intended for, though, so that's understandable.

title: Event Registration
name: Maritza K.
comments: Comments: For the registrant the process is seamless, however, Eventbrite could improve their backend experience for those putting on the event. For example, not all event hosts have the digital capability to scan everyone's ticket. It would be helpful to non-profits or organizations who are boot strapping to more easily be able to download an excel sheet of attendees, or load names directly to a name badge template.

title: great tool not just for connection, for hosting and/or event planning as well
name: Freddie L.
pros: Pros: It is a great tool for searching event, but also a great tool for hosting an event. guests searches, calendar, and event details, all are under one interface.
cons: Cons: I hope there will be multi language options. It will be easier to reach different language, culture so that we can reach more people.

title: Easy way to plan events for team
name: Ericka B.
pros: Pros: Easy way to get out the word when the team is having an event and getting people to RSVP. It sends reminders out too before the event if they haven't RSVP'd.
cons: Cons: Nothing really, it's a pretty straightforward product for what it is. I don't really like all the emails they send me advertising various different things, but all companies do that.

title: Awesome platform for event organizers and those who love to try new things!
name: Alisa R.
comments: Comments: When I was organizing public events in Las Vegas, I preferred this software because it had 3 options for membership. My tickets were always free, but when I considered a small paid event, the fee per ticket seemed reasonable.
pros: Pros: I love how easy it is to create an event and link to Twitter and Facebook. The user interface isn't clunky and it's very user friendly. Eventbrite is also a fun place to search for events. I've found a lot of events that I wouldn't have heard about otherwise.
cons: Cons: I can't think of any cons at this time.

title: Excellent Product for FREE
name: Amy G.
pros: Pros: Keep track of all of your attendees in one place! Collect funds, contact attendees, with added (paid) features like printing name tags.
cons: Cons: Extras that would be helpful such as printing name tags are integrated with third party sites that will charge for their services. Excellent product if you're looking for basic event management functions.

title: Very Useful for Recruiting and Advertising
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I like how easy it is to use and set up your events. We used this software to advertise our job fair events. This software allows us to send mass communication to applicants in our ATS informing them about our event and asking them to RSVP for it. It has made the events easier to manage because it gives us an idea of how many candidates we can expect to attend by allowing them to select time slots.
cons: Cons: The only thing I do not like is that it allows our applicants the ability to select multiple time slots for our events. It would make more sense to only allow them to select one time slot. Allowing the candidate to select multiple times with multiple tickets has inflated some of our numbers, which can be misleading because we think more candidates are going to attend than actually will.

title: easy to use
name: Cathy R.
pros: Pros: i have used Eventbrite on several occasions for events I had planned. it is easy to use and show the ticket on the phone or print it off. which ever you want to do.
cons: Cons: I don't know of any. because if you have an issue you can get help and they will walk you thru it.
overall: Overall: it has been a pleasant experience using Eventbrite for the events I have went to.

title: Love eventbrite!
name: Ashley D.
position: Assistant Director of School, College, and Program Marketing at Endicott College
pros: Pros: easy to set up, allows for images, easy to import into email, able to link event to calendar, allows for greater reach of a public event
cons: Cons: doesnt allow for alot of information, can be confusing to set up
overall: Overall: great way to track event registrations (Even if free) and be able to reach a larger population with public events

title: Eventbrite makes registering for events easy
name: Dennis G.
pros: Pros: One of the things I really liked was that even if the event was free, Eventbrite was seamless, just as if you had paid for a ticket.
cons: Cons: I don't like that in order to create a login, I had to use a service like LinkedIn to login with. I feel that it would be nice to be able to create a login specific to Eventbrite.
overall: Overall: I work for a University and a lot of our events are free and use Eventbrite and it's always a seamless experience. You can also save the tickets as cards on my iPhone, which is very convenient.

title: User-Friendly and One of the top in line
name: JASVIN G.
comments: Comments: Eventbrite is one of the important tool to register yourself for any event and the team working behind the screens are really enthusiastic at managing stuffs, and events, making it a memorable experience and user-friendliness makes life easy.
pros: Pros: Being a Student at UNLV, Nevada, where Most of the time Events and festivals take place, and I have trusted this company to get the tickets for the events, It is very user-friendly that a KG Kid can easily print a ticket for him/herself. The whole Process usually takes place in three steps and It also gives an access to mark it on your calendar so you don' miss it anyhow and you promptly get an e-mail regarding your registration and E-ticket.
cons: Cons: Add-ins for invited guests and users can make the process more efficient and convenient and it can also be used to avoid the rush at the event itself.

title: Eventbrite Tonight!
name: JD L.
pros: Pros: It's ease of use and functionality make it accessible for anyone to use regardless of age or tech savviness.
cons: Cons: Nothing really except that's it's still technology that people of an older generation might not understand.
overall: Overall: I've used Eventbrite on a couple of occasions. Each time to secure tickets for an event. I was able to reserve many many tickets very easily. They just had to be printed off, and there they were. It was easy, functional, and worked each time. It automatically uploaded to my digital calendar, and I was sent "reminders" about my event. LOVED IT!

title: Stay in the Know!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It's so easy to figure out what's going on in a city near you!
cons: Cons: There are so many events to choose from. Sometimes it is hard to see which are the popular events.
overall: Overall: There are great benefits to using Eventbrite. I have created events for the community and also able to have plans for my friends and family when they come to town.

title: Well organized and professional site
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: High quality and well designed. A great third party tool for events that require a higher level of brand image without having to invest a lot in a proprietary system.
cons: Cons: It can get expensive as the size of your event grows, so it requires some research. There isn't much flexibility built into the pricing model.
overall: Overall: Looks great and trustworthy

title: Great Events At Your Fingers
name: Radiah A.
pros: Pros: I love this software when looking for fun things to do in my area. You can purchase tickets to so many popular events in your area and other areas.
cons: Cons: Sometimes you well find an event and it will be listed by so many people. Some people post events that aren't real just to get your money.

title: easy to use
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Everything was easy to use and understand. I would not have known about many local events had it not been for Eventbrite. Great for military spouses to find local events.
cons: Cons: have no complaints at all about Eventbrite.
overall: Overall: Absolutely positive experience. Eventbrite helped us register for many military events. It also led us to discover many local events.

title: Eventbrite works well for scheduling trainings at work
name: Eric C.
comments: Comments: N/A
pros: Pros: We use this to sign up for monthly trainings at work. We are required to complete 3-4 continuing education classes each month and Eventbrite does a good job with it. You can view everything on one page along with dates and times that fit into your schedule.
cons: Cons: The one thing I don't like at all is once you select a specific training you have to go back to the very beginning and start all over to select another one. That is very annoying.

title: I've used it signing up for events at different times
name: Ernie Z.
pros: Pros: I like how it's pretty easy to use, and how it can include a good amount of info about the event. Some sites don't always include that much. It seems pretty easy to navigate.
cons: Cons: I don't like the extra fees that are tacked on, it's a little annoying to think you are paying one price and then it bumps up because of an extra fee. But it does seem like it shows the fee before moving forward too much in the process, so that part is decent, even though having the fees is still inconvenient.

title: Great way to advertise events for free!
name: Erika D.
pros: Pros: As a small business, Eventbrite allows us to save money by advertising events for free. We can also sell tickets directly from Eventbrite.
cons: Cons: Although it is free, Eventbrite does charge a service fee when a customer purchases a ticket, however, you can pass the fee on to the customer.

title: So easy to sort out an event
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: This is such a great tool for groups, non-profits and small businesses. Easy, affordable (and free in a lot of ways). Doesn't get much easier to get things planned and organized.
cons: Cons: I don't really have any. As -is, it worked great for my "free" needs. There are upsells, but they don't get in the way of small, personal use.

title: Easy event ticket booking
name: Gajane G.
pros: Pros: I like that you can join a waiting list on some events and it notifies you about tickets if they become available. A few of my union's event tickets are usually released on Eventbrite and I find it very convenient.
cons: Cons: Everything is working and I had no problems with it since I started using it quite a few years ago.

title: Easy to Use
name: Diane R.
comments: Comments: It is easy to use for small events and to get your tickets.
pros: Pros: It is very easy to use to buy tickets and have access to them. There is an option to print your tickets or get a digital one.
cons: Cons: You cannot get tickets to big concerts or sporting events. You are also unable to re-sell your tickets. There is no update if an event is cancelled.

title: Events All in One Place
name: Tracy S.
pros: Pros: It helps you find events in your area you might not have known about. It's also aesthetically pleasing and formatted in a logical way.
cons: Cons: I wish there was a feature to allow you to choose a distance radius around your location. This would allow you to see events close by that may not be in the specific city you searched.

title: So good!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is a free/low cost solution to event promotion and management. It has a ton of great features like Facebook event integration and mailchimp integration that are easy to use.
cons: Cons: Tough one... I have had such a good experience using Eventbrite. Perhaps the only negative is that when integrating with a free Facebook event there is no way to change the name of the button from "Purchase Tickets" which created confusion. I wish we could have used RSVP or something similar.

title: Great platform
name: Audrey A.
comments: Comments: It's great product ! I hope everyone try to use it!
pros: Pros: Eventbrite has everything you want for creating an event registration form and ticketing of it in an instant , so easy to use and great for daily need. I love this great product.
cons: Cons: There is one thing I complain for using this , that you can't print a report starting on registrant's last name , but other than that is great its customer service is great and I can follow there instruction easily.

title: Eventbrite
name: Bethany L.
pros: Pros: I really like how Eventbrite includes all the details to whatever the occasion may be. I also like how Eventbrite asks if you want to add it directly to your calendar and then does so with permission...along with all the details.
cons: Cons: As much as the reminders are nice...I don't like how many reminders they give you. It also automatically alerts you of events in your area. To unsubscribe from this option, you have to do that at the bottom of the email and then follow a link.

title: For Events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It's easy to set up an event and see who's coming. We've used this in my company for almost every internal event to get accurate counts and RSVPs of those coming. We have seen the value when using this so there isn't too much left over food, so we have a venue that can hold everyone etc.
cons: Cons: The events you create on the site don't have the best design customization. I would like to be able to design the site a lot more to make it go with the theme of the events.

title: Nice way to organize events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Had a great experience using Eventbrite, it made the proccess of organizing and attending to events a lot easier. Also, it enabled me to keep in touch with others with no problems.
cons: Cons: I think they could improve the interface and communication interface (flow), but it definitely doesn't make me use another tool for that.

title: Useful & Convenient
name: Alicia C.
pros: Pros: I can search, select, & pay All on one site for any kind of Event that I could ever think of. It's so convenient & it definitely saves me time and energy having to stand in a line somewhere.
cons: Cons: I haven't seen or noticed anything that I have not liked about this site yet. To me I think it's great the way it is.

title: Eventbrite
name: Keenan R.
pros: Pros: Simple, easy to use event planning application!
cons: Cons: In the past, I felt Eventbrite's service fee was much too high. Recently, Eventbrite reduced the service fee charged per ticket, which was definitely needed!
overall: Overall: My experience with this program over the past three years has been relatively positive.

title: I love
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I like the most about this software. I like that you can download tickets to your phone, I receive emails from Eventbrite and that it is easy to navigate
cons: Cons: I do not like that there is a timer when purchasing tickets.
overall: Overall: I overall had a great experience. I use this app weekly if not monthly.

title: Eventbrite makes it super easy to setup/market events.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It's super easy to use. It's very intuitive. I'm using the newer version as well, which really streamlines setting up an event. And I love how we can charge for an event if we want, and let's us easily decide whether we want to eat the fees/taxes, or pass on the customer.
cons: Cons: Setting up bank accounts is sort of confusing. You have to create a new account on the actual event page, and then you can link it. That part should be more clear. Beside that, I haven't had any problems.
overall: Overall: It's great to work with. Very easy to setup events. We do a lot of free events, but some paid, so the fact that it's super easy to switch between the two is great. I also love people can purchase tickets through Facebook Event pages via Eventbrite. We've also had several people come to our event just because they were searching the eventbrite site. So that's an awesome bonus.

title: All in one event management
name: Amy G.
comments: Comments: Since discovering Eventbrite my job has become much easier! Eventbrite has helped us better organize our events and communicate with attendees more easily and accurately than we had before. Eventbrite is great for us because we don't have a way to collect credit card payments so this platform has been an added bonus for us. With the option to pass the credit card surcharge onto the customer we're not taking a hit on the registration fee which is another bonus.
pros: Pros: Payment collection, organization, reports, communication
cons: Cons: The reports can be tricky to find exactly what you're looking for.

title: Great for any type of get together
name: Marishia Q.
pros: Pros: This allowed me to receive invites for events, see who was on the list, and contact the host in a professional and timely manner.
cons: Cons: This is a great program that can be used for personal and professional uses. Works great for managing attendance.
overall: Overall: I was invited to several job informational meetings, dinners, and small parties.

title: Easy to Use Ticket Site!
name: Emily E.
pros: Pros: This software is super easy to use and you can post your tickets for sale in minutes. Has a very easy to use design tool and uses forms for entering your information for site.
cons: Cons: I did not like that the site did not allow you to pass their fees on to the ticket buyer if you use PayPal. They send you an invoice that you have to pay to them directly.
overall: Overall: Many of the best events I've attended were found on Eventbrite. So having the opportunity to buy and sell with them was a great experience!

title: Eventbrite
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The software is super easy up upload ANY events and link to social media. We also love the free ticket option as it allows us to more accurately determine the crowd size.
cons: Cons: I wish there was a way to automatically share an every from social media to Eventbrite.

title: Tickets from my phone
name: Rachel M.
pros: Pros: This software makes it so easy to buy tickets on the go from my phone. My favourite feature is being able to use Apple Wallet for my tickets so all I need for going to an event is myself and my phone.
cons: Cons: The only negative thing about Eventbrite is that there aren't tickets for more events available on it!

title: Wonderful Tool
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The ease of use in setup and as a user. The cost per transaction is decent and the money of sales goes straight to your account.
cons: Cons: none that I can recall, everything work well for our organization.
overall: Overall: This came in very handy in promoting our events. Great and easy use for our clients without of use of handling cash or depositing checks.

title: Really easy to use , great event tracking!
name: Beverly T.
pros:
Pros: I really love Eventbrite because it caters to a different set of events than other apps such as Meetup. These events are more professional and are of better benefit to me. The easy of tracking tickets is really where Eventbrite stands out, I can have it all in one place.

The system to find events and purchase tickets is intuitive.
cons: Cons: The one and only thing I wish was different was that it would save my login info for when I am being sent links to reoccurring tickets. That way I don't have to fill out my information every month for the same thing.
overall: Overall: I found events to go to and then had a very easy to way to keep track of them!

title: Go to tool for your event ticket sale
name: Irina D.
position: Marketing email coordinator (part time contract project)
pros: Pros: Eventbrite allows to easily create single or recurrent events and payments (such as membership fees, etc.) and add a variety of tickets available for different prices and conditions, to generate promo codes. It also generates reports that allow to see the progress of sales. Also it gives an ample opportunity to apply custom design to the event and has user-friendly forms that allow to enter event's location, date, and other details.
cons: Cons: When the company I was contracting for used Eventbrite, not all countries' currency was supported (we needed to setup events from within US, so some of the countries had to provide alternative method of receiving payment).
overall: Overall: I have a very positive experience working with Eventbrite. I used it when working on migrating content for numerous university clubs. We had to create different levels of membership and tickets with promo codes varying depending on person's levels of memberships. Eventbrite is very flexible in what you can achieve.

title: Great for managing events!
name: Pete S.
pros: Pros: Introduced to this software through a county health department, using it for an event. Really helpful in getting responses and in making the event visible, and for tracking the participants.
cons: Cons: There seem to be many of these types of apps, so I'm not sure how it ranks in being recognizable. However, once you get your clients aware that you are using this app for ticketing/promoting your event it is great.
overall: Overall: Easy to use and easy to get users to download and quickly interact.

title: Easy and cheap way to get into great events!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite has been my go to in finding out local events in the Washington DC area and places I have traveled. I like how they allow to filter events by free or paid, by certain dates, and what your interests are. I have used it to help host events and track the number of people coming to happy hours, so it's easy to coordinate and prepare for events as well.
cons: Cons: Sometimes I would like to see the number of people who have paid/come out to the event as a user so I can figure out the interest. In the mobile app, sometimes the QR code doesn't scan and it would be nice to have a manual code entry feature.

title: The Solution to Perfect Event Management
name: Ryan W.
pros: Pros: They have a lot of features for small, medium and enterprise sized events.
cons: Cons: It doesn't offer much in terms of omnichannel marketing. You can integrate with your Facebook event page but beyond that, you can't advertise directly in the platform.
overall: Overall: It's perfect for larger events who want their box office managed by an expert.

title: Great for our High School events
name: Moses P.
pros: Pros: My kids high school has been using Eventbrite for a couple of years now for musicals and other events. Really like being able to go online and actually picking our seats as opposed to the traditional first come first served seating. Another great feature is being able to just use your smartphone for them to scan when you walk in the door and not have to keep up with paper tickets.
cons: Cons: We have seen no issues so far in the last couple of years.

title: Invites go to Spam
name: Greg Y.
pros: Pros: Easy to use, create nice looking evites, and well established
cons: Cons: Invites went to spam, limited customization.
overall: Overall: I have hosted a couple of different events on this site, and have had some issues with the email invites going to spam. While it is easy to set up your event and there are a few different customization I can make for it, it is pretty bad when your invite goes directly into someone's spam box. Pretty useless at that point.

title: Execellent Software (Free too!)
name: Shayla P.
pros: Pros: I love this software for creating events and invitations. It's done electronically, you can create as many events as you want, invite people, and see who rsvps. Very convenient.
cons: Cons: No complaints as of yet. I only use the free option which works great.
overall: Overall: Easy way to communicate with guests and get a head count.

title: Excellent Platform
name: Lorie T.
comments: Comments: I have been using EventBrite for over 7 years and love its ability to sell tickets to events for my companies and organizations.
pros: Pros: EventBrite is user-friendly. Easy to set up events and link them to your website. I Love the new Facebook Addin which allows your guests to buy tickets right from the Facebook event without having to be connected to another landing page or external site.
cons: Cons: EventBrite is limited in the marketing aspect. It is great that you can sell tickets on this platform and they have made leaps and bounds with integration for Facebook and MailChimp but if you are looking for a one-stop shop, this may not be for you.

title: Easy event planning
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The pros of eventbrite are the ease of creating and posting events. These events can be whatever you need them to be whether free or paid. It is also easy to share and integrate with other platforms such as FaceBook.
cons: Cons: Can't really think of any cons for eventbrite, it simply gets the job done!

title: I have used Eventbrite many times to search and schedule events to attend.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite makes it very easy to find business-related events, and all the information in order to attend.
cons: Cons: Eventbrite has failed me in the past. I have purchased a seat for an event and paid on the Eventbrite website, just to arrive and have no record of me. That may be the event planners more than the software.

title: Easiet Way to Promote Events & Sell Tickets!
name: Melanie V.
pros: Pros: Easy to use and learn. Easily navigated by the public who will be using it to buy their tickets.
cons: Cons: Fee for ticket sales and limited customization on the look of the event.
overall: Overall: As a nonprofit organization, we have greatly benefited from Eventbrite and its functionality to collect RSVP's and sell tickets.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Check out the "code" function so that only a select group with the code can access tickets for free or discounted. This changed the game when it came to access to free or discounted tickets for a subgroup of people.

title: Easy to Use
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I really enjoy the ease of use of Eventbrite. It is a straightforward platform. It is easy to search for events and to purchase tickets. I love that it also sends a confirmation e-mail with an attachment of your tickets that you can add an event to your calendar.
cons: Cons: I have not had a negative experience with this platform. I have heard people have a hard time with customer support if they need a refund, but this is not something I have experienced.

title: So easy to use.
name: Martha S.
comments: Comments: It has made it so much easier to schedule training's and meetings. Everyone can just respond and then I know how many to plan for and what I will need to bring for the meeting.
pros: Pros: It is so easy to use that even I, who am technology challenged, can use it.
cons: Cons: I cannot think of anything that I don't like.

title: Great for Events
name: Olajumoke O.
pros: Pros: Just like the name, it's a one stop shop for any event or gathering, very easy to use and doesn't need any extra tutorial for those that would be registering for events using it. I also like the fact that you can program it to your taste and needs like when you have to send reminders to participant of your events. I've been using Eventbrite for the last 2years for my event and I've not had any regrets.
cons: Cons: You only do not have to pay when your event is free but it's not bad anyways. Also the timing for each registration, some first timers might not really get the whole concept at first usage.

title: AWESOME & ENTERTAINING
name: Jenna W.
pros: Pros: I have used EventBrite for personal and business reasons. I love to see what events are happening around me including concerts, comedy shows, etc. It's also very easy and affordable to post your own events without an entire management software. Great for small singing gigs and music shows.
cons: Cons: The only con I have for Event Brite is that the learning curve could be pretty hard to non-techies. Lots of details can easily be missed when setting up events.

title: Great for organizing and finding interesting events
name: MIchael Z.
pros: Pros: I like how I can put my interests into the site and search for opportunities to meet other people that like to participate in similar activities or classes. I also like the map feature that shows me where the events are in my city. The wide variety of events is also very interesting.
cons: Cons: The site is great some of the events can get expensive but other than that I really don't have any significant complaints.

title: Forced switched from Ticketfly-- not angry about it!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is a super easy and user friendly ticketing system. Everything on their site is very straightforward and easy to navigate.
cons: Cons: I don't like that the gross number on the auto reports that get sent out include fees-- that number isn't useful when it comes to sending net and gross over to ticketing agents.
overall: Overall: Overall, I think Eventbrite is useful. Lower fees than AXS and ticketmaster, and easy to use for smaller clubs and music venues.

title: Employee Review - Eventbrite
name: Kadi D.
pros: Pros: This software makes it easy for employees to organize and attend company events. I would also assume it helps our HR department keep track of what employees are going to what company events.
cons: Cons: One time I could not remember whether or not I had received my tickets for an event. So, I just went in and got two more. It turns out that I had already applied for the event, and then I had four tickets to the event. The point being, that could throw off numbers for HR. I realize this was my fault but it would be nice to be notified of duplicate tickets. The event was free, so this did not cost me any extra money.

title: Eventbrite is where I find all my events!
name: Michele L.
pros: Pros: I use Eventbrite for work as well as personally. The ease of navigation and user friendliness is top notch! I use this site for finding different charity events for my company to give silent auctions to, as well as leisure time for myself! I have been using this website for quite some time and it never fails to show me all the events I need to see!
cons: Cons: I cannot not think of anything I would change about Eventbrite. It meets all my needs currently!
overall: Overall: I am being able to use it for work to find charity events that are having silent auctions that we can donate to and the filters are great for choosing and picking what I am looking for!

title: Good ticketing system
name: Vicente G.
pros: Pros: The professionalism of the system, the ease with which you can create an event, the speed with which processes the purchase and design
cons: Cons: The mobile version does not display the seat map but automatically assigns it.

title: Best Event Creation Site Out There
name: Amanda S.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I love how easy it is to use Eventbrite. You can quickly make tickets, track sales, update event and attendee information as needed. Plus, there is so many useful articles in the help center- it really can't be beat.
cons: Cons: I haven't found anything I dislike about the software, the only thing that comes close is that it took me a while to figure out how to actually contact customer support for help with an issue I couldn't find an article on.
overall: Overall: This has made our registration process super easy. Plus, we are now able to offer tickets with payment plans- something we couldn't offer before Eventbrite.

title: Love this
name: Tonya L.
pros: Pros: I love eventbrite!!! I've purchased tickets from here before and it was great. No hassle and straight to the point. I'm happy they even promote local events!!
cons: Cons: There is nothing to dislike about this software.

title: EventBrite Ease
name: Donna W.
pros: Pros: It is so easy for people to simply log into it and let us know they will be attending our event.
cons: Cons: Not the software, but, sometimes the user. Some people added their info. to our event and then did not show.
overall: Overall: This helped us to really be able to plan for a general number of people that would be attending our event.

title: Simple and Effective
name: Cameron J.
comments: Comments: If you're running a free event it's a must-use. Lots of ability to set up events with all sorts of configurations and easy for your participants to find, register and manage via the apps & online. The only thing that's missing (last time I used it) is the ability to set up templates for events and quickly run them again (you can copy an event but you have to reconfigure date & times & locations which are on different screens).
pros: Pros: Easy to use Free for free events Lots of options Mobile app for participants
cons: Cons: Difficult to run events that reoccur but irregularly.

title: EventBrite Allows Us to Track Conference Registrations Easily
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It was easy to install and setting up events is very easy. Applicants reported no problems registering and reminders were sent in a timely manner.
cons: Cons: It is not the most professional looking site. They also tend to send a lot of promotional e-mail.

title: Simple and trusted
name: Vicki E.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite has a trusted reputation, making it easy to sell tickets online - have found this to be a problem using other ticket vendors, especially on social media.
cons: Cons: I have never personally had a problem, but I understand it can be difficult to issue refunds if an event is cancelled.

title: Eventbrite Review
name: Kitan L.
pros: Pros: Easy to use event scheduler. This allows you to create events, put in your ticket price and then you share the link provided to have people sign up for your event. Really easy to use software that gets the job done, it notifies the creator when people sign up and lets you keep track of how many people do. I also like that, if you don't have anything to do you can literally just search your area for event happening around you and choose from the great list of things to do.
cons: Cons: Honestly couldn't find anything I did not like about the software

title: Great ticket sales plattform
name: Angela S.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is easy to set-up and manage. You can customize your checkout page with your some of your own info which is nice. Pay out is fairly quick. It's also great to be able to print out a list/spreadsheet of all your sales with names.
cons: Cons: The fees. It's standard that any kind of credit card processing is gonna come with fees though.
overall: Overall: I've used it professionally for our non-profit organization events. I've used it personally as well. Very convenient

title: High Quality yet Simple Event Hosting Software
name: Tony C.
comments: Comments: All around a great product at a good value.
pros: Pros: Eventbright is a very powerful system that is fairly simple to use. Creating an event page, promoting the event, tracking ticket sales, collecting data about your guests, and checking in guests/accepting tickets are all reasonably intuitive. Eventbright will integrate smoothly with outside marketing platforms.
cons: Cons: Guests for an event can be looked up, but you can't print a report of their registration. Offering paid ticketing costs 10% of the ticket price, which seems expensive, but is still worth it for the convenience.

title: Eventbrite always has great event finds, and great for sharing events!
name: Joseph P.
pros: Pros: A simple to use web application which allows you to advertise your event. Also has benefits that event write listings may show up on Google Searches.
cons: Cons: Interface can be buggy at times, determine what category to place it under can be vague.
overall: Overall: Eventbrite is a great platform. Private or public events.

title: The best ticketing and event management tool I've used
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite really is the bog standard for ticketing and events. It's very flexible and you can customize things like early access, waiting lists, referrals, etc. without having to read through a 1000 page manual. The uptime has been fantastic and we've never encountered a crash due to servers being overloaded. The newly designed mobile app is a big improvement and participants can exchange contact details, upload slides and documents, and register for sessions at the event (conference style).
cons: Cons: A bit pricey compared to competitors but in my opinion Eventbrite is worth the costs as the functionality simply can't be beat in other companies' products.
overall: Overall: We use Eventbrite for ticketing of academic conferences and managing registrations for these events.

title: Eventbrite Review
name: Christian N.
usage: Review is based on a free trial
pros: Pros: As an attendee of a seminar that utilized Eventbrite for it's attendance management, I had a very good experience with Eventbrite. It's integration of payment, documentation, and followup communication made attending the seminar very easy and streamlined. Additionally, it's website collected and displayed aggregate information on like-events and other ongoing events, making expanding my knowledge of additional or similar events.
cons: Cons: There really were no cons I experienced as a user of the software to make a payment for tickets and also to receive information about the event I was attending.
overall: Overall: Overall, if you are an event organizer, I can vouch for the ease-of use and streamlined integration of ticket purchasing and documentation management made possible by Eventbrite.

title: An easy way to manage your tickets
name: Dealdiane D.
pros: Pros: I have used this many times as an alternative to a real paper ticket. Super handy, and saves you the trouble of either having your ticket printed or posted to you.
cons: Cons: I have not used it to send invites (i.e. as an admin) so I guess I'm pretty one-sided but I have not found any faults so far

title: Eventbrite is brite
name: Samantha D.
pros: Pros: Its efficient and easy to use. Allows others to promote and sell tickets to their events. Low fees.
cons: Cons: Never had any issues with this software.
overall: Overall: I have purchased many tickets through eventbrite. Many of those tickets I have purchased were EDM events. I enjoy the fact that their fees are not ridiculous like Ticketmaster or live nation. Also, eventbrite is very easy to use. I have never had any difficulties with using the site nor has it ever crashed or given me errors. I really embrace their style of letting other individuals sell tickets on their site. With Ticketmaster or live nation its usually huge arenas or venues. Event brite gives other the opportunity to host their own events and sell tickets on their site. Eventbrite is brite!
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: No advice is needed.

title: Best way to promote an event!
name: Marita K.
pros: Pros: The platform has a modern and beautiful design, you can create and share an event in few minutes. Moreover you can also find very interesting events around you or in any city you like, it is also a way to enlarge your activity horizons.
cons: Cons: There is nothing that I dislike or I would change about this platform, but maybe a filter to find out which events are free and which are not would be great.

title: Eventbrite makes it easy!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is a very user-friendly way to register for an event!
cons: Cons: The only thing I would add would be a way to add photos to the event. (This may be a feature I simply haven't discovered yet)
overall: Overall: Eventbrite makes it easy to register for upcoming events, add them to your calendar and share that you're going to attend.

title: Beyond amazing event registration platform!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Amazing and user-friendly platform for customizable event registration. This is my favorite of all registration platforms. Try it. You will 100% love it!
cons: Cons: They charge a fee. You can decide if you or buyer will cover it. I wish the fee was less than it is.

title: Awesome for my Small Business
name: Rebekah S.
pros:
Pros: Minimal fees

Easy to use

Very customizable
cons: Cons: I couldn't find a way to 'copy' or 'repeat' a past event without having to just start from scratch.
overall:
Overall: The software is so easy to use and very practical for selling workshop tickets for my small business. I loved being able to quickly create and custom event with all the necessary information for attendees to purchase their tickets in advance. For me, it's worthwhile to pay a bit extra and have multiple types of tickets for my workshop.

Give it a try. I think you'll love it too.

title: One of the best ways to promote your events online.
name: Todd L.
pros: Pros: At the freemium level, this is a fantastic way to share your free events. The cost is fairly effective if you have to pay to use it.
cons: Cons: Some of the app integration doesn't always work the the best way it can. However, Facebook events share does.

title: Great tool for event management and RSVP
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite provides a great tool in which hosting or signing up for events is very straigtforward and provides accurate data of everyone that is attending those events. The ability to print out tickets also provides a valid proof to ensure that only authorized and invited personnel are able to attend.
cons: Cons: The algorithm that it uses in order to match events based on your past profile can be improved a little bit as there are a lot of occasions where I have found that the matches are not accurate based on your search and past history
overall: Overall: Positive experience

title: Makes it easy for event sign-ups
name: Sarah E.
comments: Comments: It works
pros: Pros: I have used this for fun run sign-ups and for the sale of high-school musical tickets. It is very easy to navigate for the administrator and the person signing up.
cons: Cons: It is very generic and you will have ads on the screen. There is a service fee added on to each purchase.

title: Really nice event management and promotion
name: Raewyn T.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is one of the best tools out there for event management, it's got all the features you need to organise and easily promote your event to others.
cons: Cons: Don't have any cons really it's easy to use and has all the features I need. I haven't looked into many other tools to compare.

title: Great for events
name: Lindy R.
pros: Pros: I find Eventbright extremely easy to use and love that it gets events out and advertised. Easy to link to and looks professional. I recommend this to anyone hosting an event.
cons: Cons: I honestly can't think of what I disliked except maybe how much they charge for the use of the site.

title: Review on Eventbrite
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Its a very good tool to manage your events. The best part is its Mobile app which helps at event to get the attendance and automated reminders are just wow.
cons: Cons: need to create more awareness about this tool in the market.
overall: Overall: Very good experience always. Very good mobile app, very good features.

title: Event Landing Pages
name: valerie b.
pros: Pros: It's very easy to use and edit.
cons: Cons: Basically no customer support. There was a customer support line to call that just defered me back to the website.
overall: Overall: I am an events coordinator who has used this software for several events. While I find the software to be easier than most to use, I find the customer support to be severely lacking.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Please have more attentive customer support.

title: Eventbrite is clean and efficient!
name: Bryant M.
comments: Comments: I use this software all of the time and am a huge fan.
pros: Pros: It makes your event registry simple and visually appealing. I love how clean the design is an how there is great organization in the back end.
cons: Cons: None. I really like Eventbrite. If anything, I would like to see it a little more efficient for 'free' events.

title: Eventbrite for the money
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The software is easy to use. Events, email lists and blasts are easy to set up.
cons: Cons: The software is fine, but the cost to use is too high, specially for non for profits.
overall: Overall: We use Eventbrite because we do not have other options at the moment. But we are evaluating less expensive options for our members to use.

title: Very easy to find & browse events!
name: Katharina S.
position: Field Technician, Center for Environmental Biology
pros: Pros: My university uses Eventbrite to host and manage our arts/theater events, which is how I was first exposed to the service as an attendee. I find their website layout very pleasantly simple and enjoyable to use. Afterwards, I was pleasantly surprised by their "rally" recommended event emails (the rare company that sends genuinely interesting emails). I love being able to browse events nearby by category or mood!
cons: Cons: (This may be a feature I'm not aware of or that my university perhaps did not utilize, but) while attempting to register for some of my university events, I missed the brief window where tickets became available and was not able to attend because they were sold out. I wish you could sign up for email or text alerts.

title: Keeping track of events is easier
name: Ramya P.
pros:
Pros: The app allows for download of tickets/ QR code/ Bar code making it easy to pull up tickets at venue. Also allows syncing with Apple Wallet.

Ability to add events to Apple calendar to track them.
cons: Cons: Does not allow ability to customize reminder emails before an event.
overall: Overall: The app is being used by many academic and non-academic bodies to organize events and enable people to register. It is the new RSVP form and ticketing app.

title: Best Event Managing Platform
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Outside of Facebook, there aren't a ton of options for event management and curation; that's where Eventbrite fills in that gap. I've used it for both personal and work purposes and Eventbrite is super easy to use and my favorite part is being able to roll-forward events and duplicate listings for re-occuring events.
cons: Cons: The basics are free, which is great, but it does cost money to add different types of tickets and in some situations quantity limits for those tickets. Instead of a fee by ticket sale, it would be nice to have a subscription based payment model as an option.

title: Great software for promoting and supporting events and meetings
name: James S.
comments: Comments: Great, we can promote meetings, ensure signups and payments and market events just as we need to.
pros: Pros: Easy to use, intuitive interface, has rapidly become the standard for tech events and meeting planning.
cons: Cons: Nothing negative to say about it, very easy to use.

title: Eventbrite makes it easy
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is great because it helps keep track of RSVPs in an orderly way, and is super easy to setup and use. The integration/sharing of the software with other platforms (like FB is great too).
cons: Cons: I'm not there is anything in particular that sticks out at this time..

title: Great tool for organizing and attending business or tech events
name: Silviu O.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite has great exposure to the tech ecosystem. Lots of events are being posted through Eventbrite hence lots of choices for attendees and event organizers. Their registering system is seamless. Creating an event is also extremely easy.
cons:
Cons: Although free for free events, pricing can be a bit high for low priced tickets, hence you need to consider price when setting the overall price of the ticket.

The main page when searching for events on the web does not contain the filter option. You need to perform another action in order to get to filters.
overall: Overall: A great product, no major problems.

title: Eventbrite - Ease of Access
name: Catherine O.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is a great way to get a survey of local concerts, social events, and other various occasions in your area. I enjoy using this site because it brings all of the information into one webpage so that you do not have to consult multiple websites before making a decision. It offers fast AND accurate information.
cons: Cons: Occasionally the site will list that events that turn out to be sold out when you try to check out and purchase the ticket. In addition, price changes are very frequent on this site. Be aware that prices may change even after you put an item in your cart.

title: Great website
name: Savanna G.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is so easy to look through and find things that are happening in your area. It is also so easy to post and event for the community to see.
cons: Cons: No cons Eventbrite is a great resource so get people together in a community.

title: Great program for events and concerts.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: This program is great for posting and attending events throughout the country. Allows for payment and ticketing on any device.
cons: Cons: The interface and search functions can sometimes not show all events nearby and requires some manual searches to get to the right items sometimes.

title: Easy way to get tickets or plan event
name: Anthony G.
pros: Pros: It's pretty straightforward whether you are just looking to get tickets to an event or get admission handled for your own event. Takes the guess work out of one part of your planning. Also don't feel ripped off like I do when I have to go through Ticketmaster with all of the fees added on there.
cons: Cons: Thing I like least is that it isn't popular enough for the big events. Doesn't yet compete with Ticketmaster whom I hate.

title: Great way to search for events!
name: Lynn G.
pros: Pros: I just moved to a new city, and Eventbrite is a great tool to search for events happening in Detroit and the surrounding area. I use it to look for cultural events, and I also use it for work to see what tech events are coming up. Additionally, I like that they send me emails based on what I have currently searched or have attended. This helps me to know what is coming up on the calendar.
cons: Cons: It's UX and UI design is a little basic, and not the most pleasing to the eye. This is not a huge deal at all, but it's something Eventbrite could work on for the future.

title: Great event planning software
name: Pieter H.
pros: Pros: This software is useful for any event application. Easy to use and very intuituve. Extremely scaleable: you can plan out a personal event for free, or creat events for largd scale opperations. The software includes ticketing options as well, so it can be the single program you use to reach your audience , ticket them, and collect market demographics from your participants.
cons: Cons: Can get confusing with large scale operations, and while the ticketing software is useful, it is not the most glamorous; other operatios devoted completely to ticketing can be more effective.

title: It can get the job done in most cases
name: Peter B.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: When starting off with simple events eventbrite is wonderful. If you don't have the technical know how to build your own registration website and database eventbrite is a great solution. Their infrastructure has allowed our events (both free and paid) to function quite well. Integration with mail chimp was also very useful
cons: Cons: The one size fits all approach that they have works for the most part, however when organizing an event with several tracks and different components and registration options it became quite cumbersome to set up and manage, and one envisioned portion of the event needed to be slightly changed as we could not figure out how to make registration for that component work (we ended up taking registrations in person at the event for that portion so it all worked out). I also feel that Their customer service could be more responsive
overall: Overall: It was definitely an asset to the organization of the event, despite the small bumps in the road

title: Simple, clear, and easy to understand
name: Jennifer T.
pros: Pros: I have used this a few times when scheduling meetings and classes for work. I have never had any issues with it, and i get my notifications instantly. It seems extremely easy and I like it.
cons: Cons: Nothing. It seems to be fantastic. I have yet to find a flaw with it.

title: Great for events - from grassroots to professional
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Very easy to incorporate everything you need about your event into one shareable link. Easy to include photos and link a location to the map. The interface is nice and simple. Very trusted platform, so users are not typically turned off by entering their info into this system.
cons: Cons: I have had difficulty with the payment feature. Refunding ticket sales is difficult. Not being able to receive payment until after the event ends is also limiting. You are limited to eventbrite's branding and it is difficult to change the layout to reflect your own company colors/marketing scheme.

title: Very Simple from a User Perspective
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Receiving and responding to events is super simple, for all levels of technological literacy. The events we respond to usually have well over 100 attendees and the response rates seem much higher than a traditional email RSVP.
cons: Cons: Emails can get lost in the shuffle, having the ability to invite through alternate means (i.e. through Slack or other IM services) could be useful for departments that utilize those services.

title: Makes event planning easy.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Planning and setting up events are easy using Eventbrite. It's easy to send the invite to multiple parties with ease.
cons: Cons: I've only used the software if I'm planning an event, which is a few times a year. I can honestly say I don't have anything negative feedback to provide.

title: Review Eventbrite
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The feature that was by far the most useful on Eventbrite was the capability of segmenting the target audience, I had participants and sponsors to accommodate with tickets and payments. It was extremely easy to keep track of all the orders and create promotional codes.
cons: Cons: I would say the least user-friendly feature I found in Eventbrite was that it wasn't that easy to collaborate with the rest of the team. I had given them access but it was not very intuitive as to how to work together.
overall: Overall: The best feature outweighed the least favorable feature, it made my life easy when managing the event.

title: Know who's coming (and not)
name: Suzette R.
pros: Pros: Great way to keep track (especially when space/seating is limited), knowing who is RSVP to events and so forth.
cons: Cons: I personally haven't found any draw back with this system
overall: Overall: We have only used Eventbrite and no other system - its super easy to set up, keep track and so forth...no switching here!

title: Poor customer service during actual events
name: Jessica H.
comments: Comments: We have closed our account after using them for sub par services for a few years. We are growing and its time to move on.
pros: Pros: We enjoyed using this platform because they do allow photo and video integration. They roped us in the first year we worked with them by assigning us a an actual representative, but that quickly changed.
cons: Cons: It feels choppy because each event has to stand alone. They don't necessarily link together as one large event if you are trying to build out separate events for each day or time. Horrible customer service over time. We finally started to pay for their equipment and they didn't answer their phones or emails during our event at all. They also sent equipment that is not compatible by most standards to modern day technology or building codes. They did not seem to care about the aftermath of losing money for our event.

title: Love it
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I like the ease of use and the fact that it connects to my mobile phone and work calendars, so I always know that events I've signed up for
cons: Cons: No complaints! They do send a lot of marketing emails, but it's easy to unsubscribe

title: Must have for anyone who wants to make managing events easier.
name: Tony S.
pros: Pros: Very user-friendly. As a smaller company not a lot of time and effort is needed to make things look professionally done. Customizing things like the landing page gives you more ownership.
cons: Cons: Wish we could get more information that our company wants when they register for an event. The only other down fall is getting people of the hurtle of getting to the site and getting registered, if Eventbrite could only come up with a magical solution to make that easier.
overall: Overall: Overall for easy to learn and setup. Makes your events look very professional. Give this software no hesitation and get started with it today.

title: Talk about Easy
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to use. Can go back and see what you have registered for in the past, check dates, and easily bring up on your phone or print out your ticket
cons: Cons: If you used different emails to register, you can not combine the 2 emails into one account. They must stay separate.

title: I breathe a sigh of relief when I see an event organiser has used Eventbrite
name: Sarah C.
pros: Pros: I save so much time when event organisers use Eventbrite. It's a relief just to login and not have to compete all my details every time I book in to attend something. The dashboard and email follow ups are handy too.
cons: Cons: I really can't think of anything at all!

title: I used both in business and personal life
name: Sandra A.
pros: Pros: You can create, promote and send off invitations to hundreds of people with one simple click. If your event is free they do not charge for the service-which is also a major plus! They have a lot of wonderful templates that you can use to add a little flair to your flyer
cons: Cons: As mentioned in my title, I used this for both business and personal and lets just say a lot of business professionals were invited to my a baby shower. I was able to rescind the invitations but took a little bit of time separating my business and personal contact. I would recommend creating to accounts so it separates your contacts.
overall: Overall: Evenbrite helped create and mail off flyer for an event my company was having, best part about it, since the event was free, we did not have to pay for it.

title: Event Planning made easy
name: Rozario S.
pros: Pros: quick and efficient event planning especially for someone who is on the go and doesn't have the time to make and send out invitations
cons: Cons: There is not much to not like about this service. unless you are not tech Savy or are catering to people who are not tech savy

title: Great tool as an event attendee or host
name: Verified Reviewer
pros:
Pros: The user-facing website and app offers a great user experience, making it a good choice for hosting an event through Eventbrite.

It's great to be able to set up a free event if you have no entry fee.
cons: Cons: It'd be nice to have a lower price option for events with a lower cost of entry.
overall: Overall: Eventbrite has been the choice of service chosen between colleges for hosting (and attending) game development industry events. It simply works and is great to use.

title: Easy Way For Our Team To Promote Events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: - Basically creates a landing page for us without having to communicate (and pay) for our web development team to make one - Visually appealing - Pushes onto a strong event searching pool - Built-in analytics dashboard very useful for quick insights on event campaigns
cons: Cons: - Landing pages it creates is fairly generic (looks like any other Eventbrite landing page) - Revenue payment is delayed for us until post-event, leaving us a bit stranded at times for cash - Customization of page difficult without extensive coding knowledge

title: A customized event planning platform
name: Manish T.
pros: Pros: mobile friendly Customized as per user requirements great collaboration with google maps and social accounts
cons: Cons: Site crashes multiple times because of load non responsive customer service issues with refund of the tickets

title: Useful for limited invite events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: My school uses this for events where the attendance is limited. This is a great way to get RSVPs that can be rescinded and given to others if the original person is unable to attend. Email reminders are a great feature.
cons: Cons: The sign up generally signs me up for marketing emails which can be annoying. It's hard to tell if I am unsubscribing from the marketing emails or all communications such as my reminders.

title: Great app!
name: Brian A.
pros: Pros: This app is great, mobile and web both. I have not created any events but I have RSVPed to a number of events. It is also great way to find things to do.
cons: Cons: I honestly I cannot think of any negatives. I have never had issues with RSVPing or getting to an event that takes eventbrite.

title: Excellent App for Keeping track of whats going around you
name: Khurram M.
pros: Pros: This app/software allows staying connected with the world. I've used it to book formal events, events related to the university, cultural events and many more.
cons: Cons: The is very less to dislike about this app/software.

title: Easy to Use for Anyone
name: Nathan S.
pros: Pros: I've mainly used this product to sign up for events, and everytime I do, it works smoothly.
cons: Cons: The only questions I've had with this product have come from the lack of clarity of information from those who set up events-----the product itself is clean and clear.

title: Eventbrite is overall an awesome company
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is super sleek and easy to use. I love their marketing emails and what they do as a company.
cons: Cons: No cons to using Eventbrite. One of the better companies out there managing events and making it easy for everyone to use.

title: Great App
name: Sai P.
pros: Pros: Let's you purchase tickets for almost anything. I purchased tickets many times here starting from meet ups to conferences.
cons: Cons: The fees is higher some cases. Other than that the the website works perfect in all cases. Pls look into the pricing.

title: Easiest way to manage your events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I've been an early adopter and I love how over the years, the app gained many new features but was able to retain its ease of use for everyone. It's such a powerful tool, invaluable for anyone who has to organize and manage any events - from birthday parties to big conferences. The search and browsing features are definitely the things that sets this app apart from competitors.
cons: Cons: Sometimes pages are so crowded with information that it might become hard to scan and process them - a little redesign and small improvements in the UI could definitely help.

title: Great Way to Coordinate and Manage Events
name: Andrew C.
pros: Pros: The ability to allow consumers to purchase tickets online to an event has given our Non-Profit Organization that I volunteer for a great way to manage attendees and track attendance as well as their payments.
cons: Cons: The fees for the transfer of funds to our account was a bit high, but for a convenience factor we chose to utilize Eventbrite for all advance purchases. I do know that Eventbrite has a pay at the door feature where I can track that they paid, but since we did not purchase the Card Reader from Eventbrite we could not connect the Square reader we had already.

title: Eventbrite Review
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is very easy to use. The best feature I find in it is its integration into emails. Provides features like asking queries to your guests, which helps me get to know the target audience even better.
cons: Cons: The interface could be more self explanatory especially when creating discounts or custom fields. Perhaps adding help boxes for these features could save the user from navigating to other pages for more information.
overall: Overall: Overall, Evenbrite is a very helpful application for creating and managing events. I would recommend this software to my colleagues.

title: Events that sell
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I host events at least once a quarter and search for events to attend every month. It is the only platform I use to track sales for my event, process payments, and widely invite past attendees to my event. It has articles that guide you on how to better market and sell tickets. The communication tools are excellent.
cons: Cons: I don't like that you can't get a payout every week; the final payout is on the same schedule as the others, and I can't collect the final payout after the event immediately ends.
overall: Overall: I LOVE Eventbrite and it has helped to optimize my events; the data collection process is excellent; it builds a contact lead of people who've attended your event in the past, so it's easy to keep track of your audience. The email list has driven at least 75% of my leads.

title: Good for ticket management.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: What I like most about Eventbrite is that you can add your tickets to your iPhone wallet, making them really quick and easy to access.
cons: Cons: In the app, the loading screen can be a bit long, but this is a minor issue.

title: Eventbrite Review
name: Tiffany F.
pros: Pros: It is simple to set up events. I love that the mobile app contains the event tickets. It is user friendly for purchasing tickets to an event. Guests to my events have commented on how much they love using Eventbrite.
cons: Cons: The transaction fee is a bit steep, according to individuals who have purchased event tickets from our organization. That leaves us with finding a way to build that into our ticket pricing.

title: Eventbrite is cool
name: LaMar W.
pros: Pros: The interface is clean and very easy to use.
cons: Cons: The only thing that I find that's a little trying at times is the finding reports. Sometimes its tedious locating the right sales reports.
overall: Overall: My overall experience with Eventbrite is very good. Collecting Data from sales is the best.

title: Industry standard event ticketing software is great, just pricier than others.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite manages events and ticketing very well! It seamlessly collects money, and has options for ways to do that.
cons: Cons: It's pricier than other similar event and ticketing software that works just as well and fits my social values better. Other than that, it's great.

title: Easy to use and duplicate events
name: Espree D.
comments: Comments: Use it multiple times a month
pros: Pros: set up is fast and you can have free or paid events. I like that you can see the organizer and contact them.
cons: Cons: Better design. Would love a sexier looking page. It's hard to design in HTML and can be clunky at times

title: Super simple ticketing system for event organisers
name: Danielle O.
pros:
Pros: - Really easy for event organisers to setup.

- Option to integrate with other platforms including Facebook and MailChimp.

- Simple option for promo/discount codes for specific customers/users.
cons: Cons: Really struggling for a con here - I love it!

title: Complete Event management package
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: So it takes only 2 minutes to setup a profile, schedule an event or purchase tickets to an event. The e tickets can be saved in my mobile. It is very user friendly product and very helpful for small to medium organisations who either with to arrange an event or attend an event.
cons: Cons: I didn't come across any such cons of the product, however for the first time users, it can be tricky.
overall: Overall: It has helped my organisation in making a database of the event attendees. The number of people invited and the actual number of footfalls can be easily tracked which turns out to be a very helpful tool for future events

title: Great software
name: Jay D.
pros: Pros: Easy to use, useful for event check-in and RSVP's for nonprofit fundraising for both small and large scale events.
cons: Cons: I honestly love this software, so I can't think of any cons for my use (nonprofit event organizing).

title: Eventbrite
name: Daniel T.
pros: Pros: I like how easy it is to use, and you can use your phone to get into the event. A lot of events are using Eventbrite now.
cons: Cons: Sometimes searching on Eventbrite can be tough. Or, sometimes the titles of events can be different than just saying where the event is (bars).

title: Great Software
name: Tacita H.
pros: Pros: This software is great for booking events, such as concerts, parties, etc. it's easy to use and it's great whenever your on the go.
cons: Cons: There is nothing lease I like about this software.
overall: Overall: Overall experience is great.

title: A solid event platform with good integration capabilities.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: This software is really quite simple to use, most features are very straightforward. The software integrates well with other platforms which is very useful when you have a large campaign that utilizes many different platforms.
cons: Cons: I've run into issues on several occasions when trying to schedule repeat events, or to copy an event to create a similar event. When copying events or creating recurring events the software is not as straightforward as with one time events. Integration can also get sloppy when creating a recurring event/copying an existing event to use a base for a new events.
overall: Overall: Our events were able to be posted to our website automatically, and we have been able to integrate our eventbrite events into our email campaigns through other platforms.

title: An easy way to look professional while letting them do all the work
name: Josh S.
