pros: Pros: Very clean interface Lets you design your event (pic + by-line) easily Handles ticketing (actual $$ or implied) Makes local connections based on your locale. Google maps
cons: Cons: Not a turn key solution. You probably will not rely on Eventbrite's networking only. So integrations still needed.

title: Non-Profit Event Coordinator
name: Jill M.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is so widely used now that it's a no-brainer when it comes to event management in all aspects. Many smaller non-profits are using it and the larger ones are tying it into their CRM as well to manage sign-ups, seating, etc.
cons: Cons: I have nothing negative to say about EventBrite except maybe they can look into updating some of the very basic interface ?

title: Eventbrite
name: Mary U.
comments: Comments: I use Eventbrite to RSVP to SXSW events. I find it easy to use, and it is consistent.

title: Great way to create events and allow people to sign up or buy tickets
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Really simple to use - just create the event, add the details, offer tickets and publish.
cons: Cons: People have to create an account to buy tickets which may put some people off. Not a big deal to me though.

title: Awesome solution to host professional events, concerts, etc.
name: Davesh M.
pros: Pros: While I would not use this software to arrange a gathering with family or friends, Eventbrite is an awesome solution for company events, large venues, etc. Eventbrite handles all ticketing efficiently, quickly, and simply. It is very clear and tickets are sent almost immediately. Eventbrite is able to handle large guest lists, as well as provides hosting for the event description, which are very powerful features in my opinion.
cons: Cons: No cons, software does exactly what it is supposed to do.

title: Eventbrite
name: Lauren B.
pros: Pros: I mean i feel like they have the market cornered. Who else would you use for this kind of stuff? Solid, consistent.
cons: Cons: The graphics aren't always as dope or beautiful as i would hope. Also sometimes i just don't care.

title: More Powerful than a Facebook Event
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: People use email now more than Facebook, so it's been the best way for me to evite friends to events.
cons: Cons: I dislike the email marketing campaigns that I and my friends receive whenever we use Eventbrite.
overall: Overall: I use Eventbrite when inviting people to an event that I really want to be special (Christmas party, wedding shower, bridal luncheon, etc). It's a cut above the normal Facebook event invitation.

title: Great value amazing customer service
name: Regina C.
pros: Pros: I love how easy it is to use
cons: Cons: I like it all
overall: Overall: Amazing price compared to competitors and the best customer service. Plus its so easy to use i could teach my 5yr easily.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: Dont hesitate to ask questions, the customer service is fantastic

title: Eventbrite-I like it, don't love it.
name: Dean K.
pros: Pros: In terms of other event hosting programs, I have found this to be the best one around. It is very flexible in the type of event being held, are it is able to work with social media platforms. Typically, when I am posting link on Facebook, I will have users link directly to my Eventbrite page to either sign up or buy tickets.
cons: Cons: I have had some issues with having it link with Facebook and seeing the correct number of attendees that plan on going. But this has only happened a few times before.

title: Easy and effective
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I used it always for free events, you get your tickets instantly and is synced with Google Calendar. You never forget anything.
cons: Cons: Not really customizable. Event's pages look a little boring.

title: Event Brite
name: Lee H.
comments: Comments: Easy to use on the business side and consumer side. Great technology platform.

title: I have used this app for several events and concerts that I have been to because it is so convenient
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: What I like most about this product is that it's easy and convenient to use. You have access to your ticket at the tip of your fingers just by downloading the app on your phone.
cons: Cons: The cons about it is that sometimes not ALL events you want to look for are on there or also sometimes it's a bit more expensive to use this app rather than other services.

title: As good as it gets for what it is!
name: Alexis M.
pros: Pros: I think that compared to adderall online event ticketing services, I felt that with Eventbrite I actually know what I paid for and how the different fees stacked up.
cons: Cons: I haven't had any bad experiences with it really, I've had more issues with bad event planners having trouble sending the Eventbrite link more than actually having to navigate hunt Eventbrite to buy the tickets themselves!
overall: Overall: As someone who registers and goes to many events, I'd say that eventbrite is by far the best way to buy tickets online or get registered for events!

title: Tickets please!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: This was a really nice way of handling tickets as a consumer. I hate using paper tickets anymore!
cons: Cons: The iPhone version has some glitchiness to it, I doubt it's using real Apple technology. Sometimes I hate even using it to look up events because of it. Also because of this when I switched over to a new phone I didn't even install it until I had to.

title: Great Place to Buy Tickets
name: Tiffany R.
pros: Pros: I like how I am able to save the events to my wallet on my Apple iPhone. This makes it so much easier to scan my ticket when I arrive at an event. I also like how you can browse similar events in your area in order to help users stay connected to what's going on in their community.
cons: Cons: I have had no issues with this software in the past.

title: A great tool to use for multiple events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to use interface that allows you to send out event invitations and review who has clicked & RSVP'd any event. Also great for tracking multiple events.
cons: Cons: Security is a bit of an issue for free events. The ability to customize the interface more would also be beneficial.
overall: Overall: The ability to organize invitations, manage waitlists and reimbursements all through the application.

title: Good For Any Organization With Events!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I would highly reccomend for any organization that hosts a lot of events to begin using Eventbrite to promote and use it for providing the admissions passes. It is such a great tool to use as it allows us to not have to create physical invitations and rather, we can mass send to everyone that we wish to invite to our event. This not only helps save resources, but also financially.
cons: Cons: What I like least about Eventbrite is that since the events are viewable by the public, many people may accidently sign up to your event and as a result, you may end up preparing for guests that never show up. This is a major con when using Eventbrite and so it is important to follow up guests after giving them admission passes to confirm that they are coming.
overall: Overall: Overall, my experience with Eventbrite has been good and I would highly reccomend for others to give it a try. It's especially beneficial if you or your organization host a lot of events, such as parties, throughout the year. There are a few features that I do not like but regardless, it is still very beneficial to use.

title: Easy to use, if set up right
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Very simple to order tickets and find all scheduled events
cons: Cons: Can be a challenge if the vendor does not know how to list their experience properly, especially if there are multiple options. Occasionally can be difficult to identify how to insert promotions as well.
overall: Overall: I have used Eventbrite for all sorts of events in multiple cities and will continue to use it whenever possible!

title: Eventbrite Review
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I like that you're able to cap off the amount of tickets you'd like to offer.
cons: Cons: I really don't have any complaints with Eventbrite.
overall: Overall: We've used them for quite a few work events and really like the software.

title: Love but limited
name: Megan C.
comments: Comments: I love using Eventbrite but I wish it had better integration with my non-profit's Salesforce. It's not seamless so they don't want to use it.
pros: Pros: User friendly, easy to set up
cons: Cons: Doesn't integrate well with our database, doesn't embed into our website

title: Eventbrite Review M
name: Malik W.
pros: Pros: You can see and access tickets to events in your area
cons: Cons: There are alot of steps to get your tickets
overall: Overall: I would prefer if there was a quick option to get your tickets rather than the long and sometimes confusing process

title: Great tool for scheduling events
name: Rachel M.
pros: Pros: This is extremely helpful software to keep track of who is attending events in a centralized way. We use it for a few volunteer community groups and is quite straightforward and easy to use.
cons: Cons: Nothing really--this is great software and easy to use with any device (and any browser! this is a huge plus for using with community-based events)

title: Our go-to ticketing platform
name: Ellen B.
comments: Comments: At The Bold Italic, we produce a wide variety of events that often have diverse ticketing needs. Evenbrite is flexible enough to meet our needs for free events, paid events, as well as events that have tiered pricing.

title: Good Event Tracking System
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Simple and clean cut to use. Setting up a new corporate account to organize events is very easy and email campaigns can be easily organized. Attendance tracking is also very simple and a mobile app is definitely the smart way. Export of data is also simple.
cons: Cons: Offers no further follow up from the event. Will be good to be able to have a survey after the event to rate users based on their satisfaction levels. Also, data analytics is fundamental, not able to track user profile and categories users.

title: Very easy to use
name: Lara M.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Good when you are looking for something to do this weekend. Very helpful in finding small events around me and supporting a cause. It's very easy to sign-up and create events. Very helpful also as an organizer of events in my college
cons: Cons: Maybe adding tiers to tickets that the goers want to avail.

title: Easy Event Management
name: Megan G.
pros: Pros: It takes about 10 minutes to set up an event on Eventbrite--I like that you can customize and create the right specifications for your event. I run small fitness classes + larger social events via Eventbrite and have found both well-managed.
cons: Cons: The tagging/organization of events could be greatly improved to allow better visibility.

title: Event attendee review
name: Natalie R.
comments: Comments: My experience with Eventbrite has been entirely as a event attendee and for the most part it's an excellent application that makes it easy for me to view the events I've RSVP'd for.
pros: Pros: It's clean and quick. I have a list of past events, and event's coming up.
cons: Cons: The only confusing thing about the app is editing my profile settings. I think it's possible to edit them on the website but not on the application.

title: Eventbrite !
name: Becca B.
pros: Pros: Ah! I can't say enough good things about this. These days, people don't check their mail, stamps are expensive, and people are always on their phones. For work, I always use Eventbrite to invite coworkers to events. Whether it's a baby shower, staff meeting, or birthday party. So easy!
cons: Cons: Nothing! No complaints with Eventbrite.

title: Easy way to sign up for events
name: Wendy S.
pros: Pros: I like that this software allows me to sign up for events with multiple organizations without creating a bunch of accounts.
cons: Cons: I have had no issues with this software to this point.

title: Eventbrite
name: Kara E.
pros: Pros: I have had great interaction with Eventbrite. I use it to sign up for events and it helps keep my calendar organized. The company sends out clear, organized, and efficient messages for events.
cons: Cons: I don't have any cons with eventbrite. I typically use Eventbrite to view invitations rather than send them out and I've never had a problem.

title: Easy Access
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Whenever I have a function that uses Eventbrite to issue entry permit or tickets, I know the process will be smooth.
cons: Cons: It would be nice if more companies/vendors chose to use Eventbrite.

title: REVIEW
name: Diamond A.
usage: Review is based on a free trial
pros: Pros: I able to nagativate this software so swiftly.
cons: Cons: There isn't anything I Did not like about this software.

title: No more annoying tickets!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I love the fact that I van just have all of my tickets on my phone! I really hated having to keep track of my tickets and sometimes loosing them. It makes life so much easier. I am usually the one in the group that buys the tickets in bulk and my friends just pay me so having Eventbrite has been super helpful.
cons: Cons: I don really have anything negative to say about Eventbrite, it has honestly made life a little easier by putting al my tickets into one safe and easily accessible place

title: Best app for buying tickets online
name: Verified Reviewer
pros:
Pros: - The design

- The ease of use

- The search feature allows me to easily see what events are happening in my area

- The subscription feature allows me to get notified when organisers im invested in post events
cons: Cons: - I only use Facebook for events, if Eventbrite integrated a social and calendar feature I would use it all the time!

title: Review
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I use eventbrite to sale tickets when I throw an event. It makes the administration side and ticket sales way easier to manage.
cons: Cons: My only issue I have is when the system goes out it sometimes screw up pricing that you have set. Overall a great product with minor issues. Will definitely keep using.

title: easy to use but not well organized
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: This product is easy to use to update and upload events and create an atheistic design. However on the user end it is difficult to filer events to specifications such as location
cons: Cons: filtering and thematic organization were not helpful
overall: Overall: I am trying to create better advertised events that are easily searchable

title: Love this for tracking event/education dates
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I have registered for many classes/events with Eventbrite and have always found it very easy to understand and use. It is clear and responsive. I prefer companies that use this because I have a clear picture of the event and details as well as any required ticketing.
cons: Cons: I am a user and have never had any issues with Eventbrite

title: Good, but not too good
name: Tony W.
comments: Comments: I've used eventbrite multiple times for general reservations and rsvping to events. Its a decent platform but I feel some added mobile functionality could help it
pros: Pros: Its cheap, really straight forward
cons: Cons: Its a little buggy on mobile sometimes.

title: Easy to Use!
name: Chelsea W.
pros: Pros: It is so simple to use from both the creating an event perspective and user perspective. I have staff ranging from teens to 80+ and they can easily register for events using this site!
cons: Cons: The paid functions seem much more advanced than free. I don't think I would ever purchase because of the amount of free functions they offer.

title: Eventbrite review by Joan Zimmerman
name: Joan Z.
pros: Pros: I like how with this software you can share the event and anybody can use it. It makes creating an event very easy. The email that is sent to other people is helpful and they can respond relatively quickly. I like how it is also free to use and respond to the invitation.
cons: Cons: I don't like how you have to have a profile to RSVP to an event that you are invited to. It also continues to send you emails even when there aren't any events.
overall: Overall: Eventbrite is good to get the word out to those you know and to those who you have contact information of. It helps when you want a mass event out there but it isn't good for when you need to target those you don't. It helps organize the event and add details.

title: Great event platform for organizations and businesses alike!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It's easy to use, can take payments and set up guest lists through the website, and has more advanced features that are helpful for event planners.
cons: Cons: Processing fees can add up and seem costly depending on the price of the event.
overall: Overall: Great product, easy to use and great interface. Event planners and attendees alike find Eventbrite to be a helpful and useful tool.

title: Set up ticket sales for any type of event
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to use software to set up ticket sales for any type of event. Love that I can create multiple pricing tiers, accept all credit cards, and use Eventbrite to check people into my event too
cons: Cons: Only minimal options for custom page design and branding without knowledge of HTML/CSS or paying for additional customization options. Still can create a decent looking ticket page that reflects your branding.
overall: Overall: Needed a way to sell event tickets and also manage entry to the same event. Eventbrite provides all of this

title: Helpful planning events
name: Lynn W.
pros: Pros: It was user friendly and menu driven, simple for an older adult to use.
cons: Cons: There were some customizations I would ha v liked to do
overall: Overall: Eventbrite was helpful in setting up tickets to a fundraiser

title: Eventbrite is a great way to invite and manage invitations for events.
name: Jessica J.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is great for managing invitations. It's great for checking people in at large events and has great tools for measuring different data.
cons: Cons: It can be an inconvenience with the extra tax that is added on for events. It causes confusion for the attendees.
overall: Overall: Eventbrite is a great tool for large events for inviting, tracking and managing attendees.

title: Easy to use as a customer seeking tickets
name: Lauren M.
pros: Pros: I think Eventbrite is very user friendly. It has an intuitive interface and straightforward directions. It is also easily integrated into many different platforms, such as Facebook.

title: Easy to Use and Great App to Have
name: Patrice W.
pros: Pros: How simple it is to set up an event and share it throughout all social media outlets as well as through your own links. Awesome platform to get the information out to the right people and also get an "RSVP" response. It is also a great tool from the other end when going to an event because you get to see what other people have committed to going.
cons: Cons: I wish you could change the page of your event to color coordinate or have a design of your choice to personalize the event.

title: Eventbrite helps you promote your event as well as manage your ticket sales!
name: Kelly M.
pros: Pros: My favorite feature of eventbrite is the promotion that comes along with posting your event! Their reach is far greater than mine is, as a small non profit, so their built in marketing and promotion is a true feature!
cons: Cons: My least favorite thing about Eventbrite is the fees, but that's just because I am a small non profit : (

title: Event registration is so easy now!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: -Easy to set up and very cost effective. User-friendly for admin to organize an event and extremely easy for attendees to register.
cons: Cons: No complaints. Lower levels of access still offer all I need to set up and event and collect registrations.
overall: Overall: I have used Eventbrite for events involving 20 registrations as well as 200+ and both have been great experiences.

title: Entertainment Calendar
name: Ashley H.
pros: Pros: It has a great ability to track ticket sales and events in the city or nationwide.
cons: Cons: It is not used by Ticketmaster which could save some money.
recommendations to other buyers: Recommendations to other buyers: This a good product to manage and maintain ticket sales and event information.

title: Easy to use
name: Christian W.
pros: Pros: It is easy to use and easy to setup. You are just couple click away as customer to complete confirmation.
cons: Cons: Not well known software where not a lot of people are familiar with.

title: Eventbrite
name: April L.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I have had to log in several times to help people order tickets to our event. I feel like it is very easy to navigate and successfully check out.
cons: Cons: I understand privacy, but I would like the address and contact info to be shown in the email after ordering. This would not be needed if you ordered yourself, as you know your contact info, but for me helping someone order, I may need this again.
overall: Overall: We have simplified our ordering for our event. People are still having issues with it, as that is why they call me, but it is because they are elderly. I feel like this is much easier to navigate than Ticketmaster, as I have used this before and had difficulties. Most people under 50 could figure this out with ease.

title: Event bright makes concerts easy
name: Samuel K.
comments: Comments: It's a great app to store all of your event tickets in one central location. Helps me keep track of everything that's going on. 100x better than ticket master
pros: Pros: All my tickets in one place
cons: Cons: None

title: Eventbrite
name: Amanda S.
pros: Pros: The software was easy to use. The directions were clear and concise. I had no trouble navigating the website.
cons: Cons: I have no negative feed back. I liked the software.

title: Easy to manage event
name: Bronte S.
usage: Review is based on a free trial
pros: Pros: I really liked that Eventbrite allowed us to have a convenient way to collect tickets for our class reunion, and get an accurate number of how many would be attending the event. It was easy to post the event and share the link and work through a convenient and professional paymeny system.
cons: Cons: I found sometimes it was difficult to navigate for event attendees for them to know how to pay for their ticket, but we were able to easily direct them once we found out the issue.

title: event brite
name: Kelly T.
pros: Pros: It is an easy way for our company to invite people to training and events
cons: Cons: It can be a struggle to make sure all event invitations are received in the proper email inbox.

title: Easy to use, efficient tool for events
name: Michelle T.
pros: Pros: It's free! This is such a valuable software to plan events, manage invites, track interest, and anything else you need around invitations for events, meetings, conferences. The tool is easy to learn - such a small learning curve. And the design of the site is straightforward, clear, concise. You can even use tools to track what people are bringing to a potluck. I can even find local events in my city listed on the eventbrite site.
cons: Cons: Sometimes, you can't edit certain styles of writing in sections like the location. Our organization has a very strict editorial writing style and this doesn't allow us to be consistent.

title: Solid RSVP and event planning software
name: Alex N.
comments: Comments: I use Eventbrite for planning small company gatherings rather than larger scale events, and using it as a free tool for free events is seamless and useful. Would love for it to be more integrated with other business software and calendar systems.

title: Eventbrite Review
name: Evelina K.
pros: Pros: I love using Eventbrite to buy tickets for events. I really enjoy that after going to a few concerts or events, Eventbrite will email me with possible shows I would enjoy going to based on tickets I have bought before.
cons: Cons: I think Eventbrite would be a little better if they sold tickets to a wider variety of companies.

title: We use Eventbrite for concerts and events and they do a great job for us.
name: Marilyn H.
pros: Pros: The signup and is simple to use, the site is easy to navigate. Every little thing is explained in god detail so there is no confusion when you post events.
overall: Overall: Advertising our events is of supreme importance to the success of the event- and the ease with which our patrons can purchase tickets and find out information about the event is crucial. This site fulfills our needs about our events.

title: User friendly to rsvp
name: Sara A.
pros: Pros: It is easy to rsvp to events and a ticket is emailed directly to you.
cons: Cons: If I closed out of the window or deleted the email there was not a way to view my ticket again.

title: Love it!
name: Hannah L.
pros: Pros: Easy to create events and invite friends, takes votes from friends to make decisions easier,
cons: Cons: Can take a few minutes to update although this only happened to me once

title: Eventbrite
name: Jon P.
pros: Pros: I absolutely love that they do not charge for free events, it is a great way to keep track of attendees via ticketing without the hassle of having to charge
cons: Cons: When you are throwing a paid event precentage payout sometimes can be a bit of a pain, but that is the nature of all sites, eventbrite makes it easy to work with

title: Very easy
name: Alaina M.
comments: Comments: If you know what you like and you choose your interests accordingly, the recommendations are always spot on. It's hard not to find something that would interest you and there are always lots of free events. I had to download the app before I moved to Glasgow because I bought a conference ticket through Eventbrite, but then I started to tinker with it out of curiosity and it quickly became a very useful tool. I was new in the city and it quickly exposed me to a lot of stuff I wouldn't have known about otherwise, I even managed to sneak into an Industry Day type event only older students were supposed to know about (and it was great, by the way)

title: My Go-To for Local Events
name: Ben M.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite makes it extremely easy to create an event and offer sign-ups, and also makes it easy as the user to sign-up for an event and receive a ticket.
cons: Cons: Can't think of any complaints currently.
overall: Overall: This is a great solution to offering tickets for local events. It's great for businesses, charities, or just to get a headcount for any type of event.

title: Easy to use
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to set up and handle events, and also easy to use as a consumer.
cons: Cons: The only con I can think of was the link to the event page was very long and jumbled looking.

title: Simple event management
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Whether paid or free it allows us to manage adhoc events in one place.
cons: Cons: We still need to run separate system for day to day bookings covering multiple time slots.

title: This platform is used a lot in my university to hold events
name: Nicolas C.
pros: Pros: The platform is quite easy to use, enter and select all the options of the event, manage payments and other tasks are quite easy and the usability is very good.
cons: Cons: Sometimes users confuse its use and create more personal events that take away the identity of the product, it should be a little more closed to a target market.
overall: Overall: Several startup groups use it to promote events and as a user it has been very easy to manage them, and completing the entire process of acquiring a place and making payments has been excellent.

title: schedule or prepare and event. With eventbrite is easy
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: web or app you can user it to schedule own events or organize it easily. Good UI and very intuitive app mobile android. Another Pro: you don't need print ticket: Just use mobile application and enjoy :)
cons: Cons: No Cons at this moment. Hope team developers and maintenance teams keep always high the wuality of product.

title: Better for Ticketed Events vs Conferences
name: Meredith W.
pros: Pros: Ease of use
cons: Cons: Price for paid ticket events
overall: Overall: Overall, the platform is easy to use and the support is good. Much better for ticketed events versus conferences for functionality and price.

title: I love Eventbrite!
name: Stacy C.
comments: Comments: I would continue to use this again and again!
pros: Pros: It's so easy to use. I purchased tickets 3 times from them and it was super easy and they continued to update me on other events that were available.
cons: Cons: nothing, this is great! It was easy to use, it sent me reminders about my event, and kept me posted on other events I might like.

title: Easy to use, would recommend.
name: Pete S.
pros: Pros: We've used this for a couple of events; it's a simple interface and worked well. Seemed helpful in also promoting the events as there was a general listing for events in the area.
cons: Cons: There are soooo many events happening - this worked for our events, but it feels like you can get lost in there among all the other stuff.

title: Great way to get tickets without hassle
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I've often used EventBrite to get tickets for certain free events I'd attend. The checkout process is always easy and quick. Fields are pre-filled if you make an account.
cons: Cons: Would be nice if they can add a feature to send reminders before the event. That way, I don't have to dig through my email to find the last pass.

title: Best Platform for your Event!
name: Amy O.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is where it's at if you are hosting an event! I love that you can have paid tickets, but also free tickets! You are able to customize your order form to capture information out of the norm, like Instagram Handle. You can print several different reports related to your attendees, you can customize the landing page for your event with your event logo, and much much more!
cons: Cons: There is almost non-existent customer service unless you really really search for a phone number.
overall: Overall: My experience with Eventbrite has been wonderful. We have put on several very large events and Eventbrite has helped us recruit attendees and manage them as well!

title: A must for special events
name: Beverly L.
pros: Pros: EventBrite is relatively easy to use, and reduces the labor of guest registration & payment
cons: Cons: Payment fees. But I understand they gotta make money somehow.
overall: Overall: Have used thsi for multiple events -- free events and fe events. Flexible to adjut and change many details mid-way through an event. Accessing reports assists in registration at the event.

title: As a user, great method to buy event tickets
name: Dallyce B.
pros: Pros: It's so easy to purchase event tickets with this software! Makes an amateur event look professional and keeps the collection of money electronic and eliminates the need to handle cash.
cons: Cons: I've only use the product based a user and not an administrator. It doesn't appear super slick or attractive on the webpage.

title: Highly Recommend for People Wanting to Create an Event
name: Tyler S.
pros: Pros: The app is great to check people into the event. It is a easy and simple to use for user and it compiles all the data for users.
cons: Cons: The payment system on the Software could be improved. A lot of people struggle to pay because things are linked to PayPal.
overall: Overall: We organize a good amount of events. We need to use this to organize data.

title: Unique, easy to use
name: Rosemary W.
pros: Pros: It's the only one I know of that manages events announcements and ticketing like this. VERY easy to use.
cons: Cons: I can't think if anything that I'd change about it.

title: Easy site! Very useful!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros:
Pros: easy to use

find out about new events

very vibrant
cons: Cons: nothing was bad for my experience. I have no cons
overall: Overall: It was easy and great!

title: Great Platform High Prices
name: Matt C.
pros: Pros: This platform is great for discovering events in your area and looking for fun things to do on specific dates. It's my go to place when trying to book a show or other event and the interface is super easy to use and runs really smooth.
cons: Cons: The only problem I have with Eventbrite and all similar platforms is the gauging of pricing for resale tickets. Not to mention the convenience fees and other fees added once you're in the checkout. Your tickets can jump from one price to another price in a heartbeat so you have to be aware of that when purchasing.

title: Eventbrite
name: BIBIANA M.
pros: Pros: I have used the software to book for religious events and it has been very easy to book.
cons: Cons: I have had only a good experience when using eventbrite.
overall: Overall: Great service

title: The Eventbrite software for managing event is a fast and accurate means for registering to attend an event.
name: Chiamaka M.
comments: Comments: Addition of other social media will be well appreciated.
pros: Pros: It is so easy to use as you just need few information to give out and you can get your ticket immediately via your provided email address.
cons: Cons: The sharing part of the Eventbrite is limited to only facebook share, which people might also want to share in other social media.

title: Such an easy experience
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I've never used Eventbrite to host events, but have purchased tickets through Eventbrite many times. It's always such an easy experience and one that you can expect from a 21st century software company. The integration with mobile apps and Apple Passbook (wallet now) is great. It just seems to work seamlessly across all devices.
cons: Cons: At this point I can't come up with any cons, it always just works. I haven't had to cancel tickets or ask for a refund yet, and perhaps that is where things can become an issue, but as I said, I'm not there yet. I also haven't seen the software from the other side (as an event planner) so not sure what that side is like.

title: easy to use
name: Morgan S.
pros: Pros: I like that your info is stored so its easy to sign up for events
cons: Cons: i dont love the lettering size and look on mobile

title: Great way to sell tickets for smaller events
name: Michael K.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite does the job and allows users to purchase tickets to events in a very simple and easy to use format.
cons: Cons: This software gets the job done, but doesn't feel like it is super rich with features. Nothing to necessarily critique but at it's core it is what it is- a website to sell tickets to smaller events.

title: It really automated
name: George O.
pros: Pros: Do you have an event that you want people attending to RSVP or pay for? Then Eventbrite is for you. It takes care of everything for you. people can purchase tickets and passes to your event and everything is automated.
cons: Cons: It takes a while to set up but once you get the hang of it, then you are good to go.

title: Practical
name: Deanna A.
pros: Pros: There are way more pros than cons with this software. It's very easy to create an event and track rsvps, which is the entire purpose of the software. I also really like the options it gives you to add pictures and descriptions. It's also very easy to share your event to attract more guests.
cons: Cons: The only thing that could make this better is if you were able to completely design the webpage that guests were brought to, to make your event seem more enticing.

title: Easy to create events
name: Elle R.
pros: Pros: Great tool to help get information on your event to the public. It is simple to use and effective.
cons: Cons: None, my team uses it a lot for our stations events.

title: Eventbrite review
name: Justin T.
pros: Pros: Nice app to quickly promote an event. It makes easy to load content and pictures
cons: Cons: It is quite good, I don't have anything negative to say on Eventbrite

title: Great for planning events
name: Breanne S.
pros: Pros: It's an easy way to organize groups (for us, it's local influencers) to register for upcoming events. I also like how you can customize the form to include paragraph text as we often need participants to tell us more about themselves.
cons: Cons: When it comes to managing/editing behind the scenes, I feel like it's a bit too complicated in interface. Also, when I export my lists of participants there's no option to export their email address too which would be helpful.

title: Perfect event hosting software
name: Haley S.
pros: Pros: We used Eventbrite to sell tickets to our annual fundraising gala and it was extremely easy to use and our donors had no problems getting tickets
cons: Cons: We had no real issues with Eventbrite. I had a few questions early on and customer service and FAQ's helped answer them.

title: Possibly obsolete, but a decent product
name: Elise P.
pros: Pros: It is easy to use, for the most part. It is quick to use and access. The UI of the page is definitely user focused, simple enough.
cons: Cons: There are some moments of bugginess with seat selection when the event set-up isn't totally straight forward. It can be kind of awkward to go through the purchase process, but it isn't terrible.
overall: Overall: I question the necessity of it with the functionality built in to platforms like facebook, but for what it is, it's a solid program.

title: Good for posting and viewing events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Useful to look for events happening in cities near you. Groups by category and can search for things that might interest you. Easy to use.
cons: Cons: Sometimes the search isn't very refined and will give unrelated events or not in the location specified. Information about the events isn't always clear, might be helpful to have more prompts for an event creator to fill out to give the users more information.
overall: Overall: Finding potential events in current location or places that I am traveling to.

title: Eventbrite Review
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The best part of this software is how they streamlined the event coordinating process. From signups to check-in and everything else. The customer support team were especially responsive as well.
cons: Cons: The level of design and uniqueness for your events is limited. I wish there were more ways to customize.

title: Love for Sales!
name: Victoria D.
pros: Pros: I use this for events for our arts and craft festivals!
cons: Cons: I never had any issues with the system, works smoothly!

title: Eventbrite
name: Mackenzie W.
pros: Pros: What I like most is the ability to find and use my tickets. Clearly labeled!
cons: Cons: What I dislike the most is sometimes the software bombards my email with event details. It may be helpful for some users but theres not an option to receive less notifications without completely unsubscribing from the entire email list.

title: Event planner with effectively no learning curve
name: Margaret M.
pros: Pros: Intuitive design. Simple process. Quick, reliable and massively adaptable
cons: Cons: I don't own it? Maybe the only thing is its popularitymeans the numbers of events is enormous, and your might get a bit lost.
overall: Overall: For events of all scales, all types, internal, external, for profit, charity, entertainment, educational .... all things to all people.

title: Event Management Partner
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Great event management system which provides a large number of great features.
cons: Cons: Customizing the registration page could be difficult and may require some programming skills.

title: Event registration beyond email
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: For groups that don't host events frequently, it allows for registration and availability management in an easy, user friendly application.
cons: Cons: Scaling may require deeper integrations. If selling tickets, fees can start to feel steep.
overall: Overall: Really good platform for groups that host events to manage availability and registrations.

title: Brighten the Event Process
name: Irum V.
pros: Pros: The software is great and one of its kind, being able to look up events, create events and coordinate by getting tickets and codes through this one software is very convenient.
cons: Cons: I actually dont have anything that I dislike about the software.
overall: Overall: Eventbrite is accessible, helps with planning, and is very conventient!

title: Easy to use, recognised brand, perfect for large events
name: Avery K.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is so easy to use when sending out an invitation to people. I have used in the past for meet ups, internal events, external events, and school events. Worked great each time and most people I sent it to knew what Eventbrite is so they are familiar with the set (making it easier for the user). I also like that you can register for more than one person and everyone will get a copy of the event, regardless if they have an account or not.
cons: Cons: The only thing I wish I could do more of is customise based on the event. For example, make it more Christmas themed if it's for a Christmas event.

title: Best solution for ticketing
name: Martin S.
pros: Pros: We use that solution for our meeting organisation. We took a look the a lot of platform and EventBrite was the best for our needs. They are not too costly and our customer can easily get ticket and get all the information that they want. You also can use their ticket validation system at your meeting entrance. I contacted the customer service to get answer to our question and they were very responsive and help us understand the benefits of their system. They also have a mobile app.
cons: Cons: I do not have a cons for event brite. They offer all that we needed for our meeting and customer service is awsome.

title: Lovin' Eventbrite
name: Raven S.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite has been super helpful in marketing events as well as being "in the know" about events going on in my city. Im glad there is an app for my phone as well.
cons: Cons: so far there isn't anything I don't like. Maybe the refund policy can be a little more clear, but other than that I am very satisfied.

title: Call Center Sucks
name: Scott H.
comments: Comments: I'm the event organizer of an event posted on eventbrite, and I recently lost access to my event editing page, as it no longer appeared under the "my events" tab. I called customer service, and the automated system literally took me in circles, repeating questions I had already answered, and never connected me with someone who could help. I am no longer an Eventbrite customer for this reason. I host a couple hundred events a year, and will now go through another company because of how horrible my experience with eventbrite has been.

title: A good solution for event management and ticketing
name: Verified Reviewer
pros:
Pros: - It is very intuitive and easy to use. It took me 10 minutes to figure out how to create the event and different functionalities such as keeping it private or public etc

- It also allows to keep the event open to only a certain audience and even there could be different ticket categories

- Automated emails, tracking, checking-in system by scanning QR code is pretty easy and helps me as an organizer to keep track of attendance

- I love how I could schedule emails and send to different audience, the sorting and searching functionalities are amazing
cons:
Cons: - Charges a high commision on tickets, which makes it relatively costly to use

- There are cheaper versions available but they lack the important features

title: It's been used to post company events for people to register to attend.
name: Andrena R.
pros: Pros: You can post pictures and links for people to view and you receive notification emails when an event ticket is purchased to keep informed on the number of attendees.
cons: Cons: When going to the Eventbrite's website it's so many posted advertised events, I get lost trying to find what I'm specifically looking for.

title: Good tool
name: Celine B.
pros: Pros: Probably the best tool to keep an event organized and sell tickets
cons: Cons: It would be great to add conditional questions during the registration process

title: I find it easy to locate events I'd like to attend for business or personal reasons.
name: Kimberley M.
pros: Pros: I enjoy the fullness of the information provided as well as the visual appeal. The presentation is stunning and inviting.
cons: Cons: There is really no downside to the eventbrite app. Going locally or nationally are also big plusses - all in all this is a superb program.
overall: Overall: This is the steroid version of the former Entertainment Section in your old newspaper. The variety of postings and the thoroughness of the information is very appealing and helpful. I recommend this to anyone with a short list, looking to expand their base.

title: Great ticket software
name: Paul T.
pros: Pros: Very easy to use and seems to be a great way to ticket events, have registered for many events and seminars that use this system and it works well.

title: Got Free Time?
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: This app is awesome for finding something to do when you have some free time. It is very easy to use and the layout is clean and simple. Tickets can also be scanned on the app which makes everything very easy.
cons: Cons: I wish there were more filters when searching for an event (price, distance, etc.)

title: Easy (sometimes free) way to gather RSVP's and distribute tickets!
name: Casey H.
pros: Pros: I love that it is free to use the software for free events. There is a fee associated with paid events, but hey, it only makes sense! I use it for all my ticketed events.
cons: Cons: If I am hosting a complicated event, it can be challenging to get all the features I need, but works well for basic events.

title: Great tool for providing tickets for events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: We had to use a ticketing system for an event and were looking for a tool providing the service in a simple way. Eventbrite resulted in the ideal management software for our needs
cons: Cons: It could have more integrations with other social platforms to provide more information on customers for retargeting

title: Great for free events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Overall eventbrite is really easy to use and get set up so that people can register for an event. On the back end it is also easy to manage registrants and attendees as well.
cons: Cons: I think the design of event pages could be improved. The branding is very eventbrite heavy, which isn't always ideal.

title: Essential for event management tool for events
name: Olakunle F.
pros: Pros: This in genius software allows event planners to leverage on technology for total management of invites and attendee data and analytics. Very easy to use.
cons: Cons: Security concerns as to security of the data generated. Basic design. Slow rate of adoption buy event planners. Has not reached its full potential

title: Simple, straight forward product
name: sean p.
pros: Pros: I love that this program sends you a downloadable link to your Icalendar. So you dont have to do much and all of the information is put into your calendar. Dates/times/locations are all placed in your schedule. It is really convenient.
cons: Cons: Honestly, I dont have anything that I dislike.

title: Event Ticketing is worth it for one off events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I love the one off events for this. Its easy to setup and sell tickets.
cons: Cons: Expensive. And hard if you want people to share a table and sit together.
overall: Overall: Good. I like it. It took sa few tweaks to get the ticket sales right and taxes and fees. But in the end, we did good. I cant use it for NYE as its too hard to seat people at same tables.

title: Easy to use
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I like how the software is easily set up and easy to navigate, I am able to get to where I need to go without having to worry if I printed the tickets off yet because Eventbrite has them ready for me and can be easily added to my Apple Wallet
cons: Cons: Not all events are uploaded on to Eventbrite

title: Eventbrite is great for anyone throwing events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I love how easy it is to set up an event with tracking and ability to sell tickets. I can connect the event to facebook events and sell tickets or have people sign up if it's free.
cons: Cons: I don't like that they Charge a fee to sell tickets on their site and I also don't like that I don't have complete control over the Event when I use them.
overall: Overall: I have and will continue to use eventbrite for small and free events that I need to keep track of and promote without a major budget backing them.

title: Makes organizing event SO much easier
name: Chase E.
pros:
Pros: Saves time and money

Helps make our events a success

Makes sure EVERYONE gets paid
cons: Cons: No cons! Eventbrite is a great service. Highly reccomended.
overall: Overall: We frequently hold events at our dog park/bar. Eventbrite helps us organize, excecute, and pay for our events and makes them a huge success!

title: Currently the Bees Knees of Event management software. I have set this up for a number of clients.
name: Wayne V.
pros: Pros: Very smooth and straightforward event management software. Has many bells and whistles to help you promote and manage your event on and offline.
cons: Cons: Works on a "percentage of sales" fee model that can be pricey especially when selling a large volume of tickets or when selling high priced ticketed events.

title: Easy to use, lightweight app
name: Margo R.
pros: Pros: I like the fast loading and ease of use of this simple app. It's also nice to be able to search the events around me.
cons: Cons: It'd be great if the app had a more bare-bones list view of events. The scroll view seems to have many different kinds of info that doesn't hang together in a way that's easy to understand.

title: Using Eventbrite
name: Kate K.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is affordable for companies and agencies that want to host events. It's free platform is also so easy to use and easily shareable.
cons: Cons: The fee for tickets can be cost-ineffective for small businesses or NPO's.
overall: Overall: Overall, Eventbrite is great! Love using it for small events and registration for free seminars.

title: Great for all kinds of events
name: Jordan C.
pros: Pros: Easy to create an event. Easy to track registrations and where they come from. Designing the registration page is also easy. Great Pardot connector too. Free to use for our purposes.
cons: Cons: Not everything is easy though. I had an issue with there being too many tabs and options and not knowing where to find what we were looking for. It didn't hurt the event overall, but it did hurt our data.
overall: Overall: I have used eventbrite for events with clients, customers, partners and prospects. It is great for any situation. The data and insights eventbrite can give you on your events is important. Free to use since none of my events had paid tickets. Overall it has been a great product.

title: Create events and track attendance
name: Teegan F.
pros: Pros: Love how easy this is to us! The ability to request payment or make free events is very nice. One of my favorite features is how the event will create a pass/ticket for iOS Wallet app that can be scanned to track attendance. Getting alerts from specific vendors is also great for keeping track of when new events are happening.
cons: Cons: I don't have anything specific that I dislike! So far, Eventbrite has done everything that I want it to do.

title: So far, so good!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It a great and easy app. Keeps you informed of all the events around you.
cons: Cons: The search may need some improvements. When searching for a specific event, sometimes it won't show up on the search results. Instead, I would have to go the longer route as in searching the venue and look for the event there.

title: Eventbrite Makes Invitations Easy
name: Abhi G.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite has become very popular for me to accept invitations to seminars and meetings electronically. I appreciate the fact I get a confirmation email soon after registering for the event with my ticket.
cons: Cons: Repopulating my information when registering for an event could be made easier.

title: A Must Have Tool for Scheduling Events
name: Bryan B.
pros: Pros: Ease of use and setup allows users to leverage this scheduling tool with little issues or technical questions. Love that is seamlessly connects to social networks and can track free and purchased tickets.
cons: Cons: Nothing - EventBrite is a must have for any organization that schedules events.

title: Great events invitation management application
name: Chin Koon T.
pros: Pros: The backend interface has become more user-friendly through the years. It lends a more professional image to your event invitation as well.
cons: Cons: Processing of payments can be an issue if you have multi-national participants. Acceptance of foreign credit cards has been a hassle to deal with at times.

title: Events
name: Barbara V.
pros: Pros: Easily keep track of events with this app. Notifications are sent to me and It makes it fast and convenient to sign up for events. I mostly use this for Girl Scouts.
cons: Cons: I don't have anything negative to say about Eventbrite.
overall: Overall: Eventbrite has helped me keep track of upcoming Events, especially Girl Scouts.

title: Ease of Software
name: cadian b.
pros: Pros: the thing I liked most was how easy it was to use the website. very simple !
cons: Cons: I have no negative comments about this website.
overall: Overall: Excellent

title: Great event management tool
name: Tiffany O.
pros: Pros: Free version is useful for managing event planning. I really like how it sent reminders for upcoming events and helped make the marketing of the events simple.
cons: Cons: There's nothing that I can think of that I didn't like, especially with the free version.

title: Know all things
name: Jennifer B.
pros: Pros: I love that I am able to review things about my sons class and that I can navigate easily through the software.
cons: Cons: I can't really pin point one thing I didn't like, for me I enjoy using it.
overall: Overall: It is nice to be able to communicate with teachers and find things out bout the class. It is a nice way of staying involved with what programs and activities they are having.

title: Eventbrite Review
name: Elisa W.
pros: Pros: I like how all events can be found in one place. I like searching for a type of event I am looking for and being able to browse through what is happening around me.
cons: Cons: The extra fees when purchasing tickets.
overall: Overall: I like it. We use it for my company bar crawl as well as a lot of the events I have participated in.

title: a very efficient way of finding, scheduling and tracking events
name: Fraser D.
pros: Pros: - used it to organise an industry event recently. The whole process was very smooth and the platform is very intuitive - integration with mailchimp was vital
cons: Cons: - did not get much use out of the analytics module. used our own internal system as we found eventbrite's analytics to be minimal

title: Eventbrite
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I love how it shows me all the places nearby me and it ranging from parties and shows to other opportunities to go have fun. It is very easy to use as well.
cons: Cons: I have not come across anything yet that I have issues with. I will update if I do.

title: Easy Event Creations!
name: Sally K.
pros: Pros: Such an easy and efficient way to create events and market them online. I can send out easy notifications and manage my event and alert all attendees very easily.
cons: Cons: Nothing, it's fantastic, easy to use, efficient.
overall: Overall: I love using Eventbrite. It keeps me organized and does all of the heavy lifting for me!

title: Eventbrite
name: Heather S.
pros: Pros: I like how easy it is it purchase tickets and invite other people.
cons: Cons: I do not like how many emails I get after I attend an event.

title: Useful but has room for improvement
name: Peter T.
comments: Comments: Product is not intuitive enough in user interace. Needs deeper features for event data. Pleased with registration portion of service.
pros: Pros: Registration tracking output
cons: Cons: Not intuitive enough

title: Easy to use
name: Amel M.
pros:
Pros: We use Eventbride to create the event of one our client.

It's easy, a lot of option.

It' help manage the ticket and give you details about how is going to be at you event.

The software is perfect .
cons: Cons: You have to make sure that you setting are right when you launch an event.

title: Eventbrite software review
name: Ashley S.
pros: Pros: I use this software to purchase tickets to local events and shows. It's pretty easy to maneuver around the site to get what I am looking for.

title: Good For Events
name: Niño A.
pros: Pros: Easy to make an event and easy to spread the event. Useful for the school events specially for the students need to improve their career.
cons: Cons: I don't like some of the events that is too much to pay the events will I don't even know what's the topic to be presented and the speaker/s profile.

title: good product
name: missy b.
pros: Pros: i've bought tickets through eventbrite several times. it's an ok service.
cons: Cons: almost every time i've tried to buy tickets through it i've had some type of issue. either a promo code i'm using didn't work or cart had issues or check out had issues. i don't know- maybe eventbrite hates me.

title: Eventbrite is bright and right for use
name: BRENDA M.
comments: Comments: I found that Evenbrite was an excellent program to use for my Church Prophetic Chambers invitation list. I could type of invitation list and register people for the biggest event we were having for our church. We knew how to prepare for many people coming and all things were in order. I enjoyed using the program.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is an effective program to use for business. This is a free program. Eventbrite has many features that are useful in the time of need. You cannot go wrong with using Eventbrite because it is an in order program.
cons: Cons: Tyring to figure out space usage and when you get stuck you have to call customer service. It is always a wait time.

title: Where you can find great events near you.
name: Len Manuel A.
pros: Pros: You can easily search for events near you with different categories that depends on your preferences.
cons: Cons: Sometimes i don't received any notifications if there is an event near my preferred location. It would be great if I will receive notifications and probably discounts or something.

title: Eventbrite
name: Keith O.
comments: Comments: Perfect for creating and tracking attendees.
pros: Pros: Easy to use and very accurate. Easy for recipients to respond, change and update. No complicated technical issues to set up.
cons: Cons: There really was not any negative issues. I suppose the application could be a bit more intuitive or interactive.

title: Hands down the best event booking experience
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is so well known and widespread, it's a real no brainer to setup events as most customers already have an account with them.
cons: Cons: Discovering relevant events in the app or using it as a feed to inspire is almost useless, a lot of spam and unmoderated content unfortunately.

title: Using Eventbrite to sign up for Events
name: Elizabeth S.
pros: Pros: The software is easy to navigate and fast with it's responding emails; I like that it has the option to add the event to your outlook calendar.
cons: Cons: I can't think of anything off hand that I did not like.
overall: Overall: My overall experience with Eventbrite is very positive. I like that there is an app option as well.

title: So easy to make a purchase!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: As someone who always purchases event tickets online, I never have any issues going through eventbrite. Super easy and I can see everything under my account
cons: Cons: As a user, I don't think there is anything I dislike about this software
overall: Overall: Super simple and easy to use and track everything purchased

title: Perfect for RSVP's and Distributing Tickets to Events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is great for getting RSVP's to events and for distributing tickets. Eventbrite has an option to collect money for the tickets or the user can just print out the ticket. The software also allows you to include all of the event information along with contact information for who is hosting the event.
cons: Cons: As a user who is just RSVPing to an event, Eventbrite want you to create an account or sign-in with Facebook which is kind of annoying when you're just trying to print out your ticket.
overall: Overall: Overall, Eventbrite is very useful for organizing events which require some kind of ticket to get into them.

title: Good platform for event RSPV`s
name: Zhanna B.
pros: Pros: It looks professional and easy to share, very easy to use. I like that free events are free to post on Eventbrite
cons: Cons: They have high fees for paid events, and there are some functions that are difficult to find. And it`s not easy to search for events

title: One of the easiest ways to send out invitations for events
name: Ethan K.
pros: Pros: I like that the website makes it easy to create invitations for events and allows you to pick a date and time. Also makes it really easy for you to track who accepts and who rejects.
cons: Cons: Do not have much cons about this website. I use it almost all the time to create invites.

title: EventBrite is great for planning events
name: Nabeel C.
comments: Comments: Overall, if you are trying to organize and event and are looking for a place to start, EventBrite should top your list.
pros: Pros: EventBrite is a great way to organize events, attract audience and get valuable data and analytics on your customers. It is extremely easy to use and the value for money aspect is simply phenomenal.
cons: Cons: The data analytics part and the email service associated with the guest list can be improved to add more features, context and insights.

title: Excellent invitation service
name: Luis J.
comments: Comments: Great applications for events.
pros: Pros: Easy to use, great user interface for the ones who will register and the admins. Easy and fast response in the QR code scanning.
cons: Cons: You need two applications to manager your event. In Mexico there is not a good customer support, we need to contact someone else in United States.

title: E tickets made easy
name: Lauren W.
pros: Pros: Great for events, works easily on phones and keeps track of tickets
cons: Cons: Not great for events where paper tickets are easier.

title: My favorite place to find events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: So easy to post and find events. I love also that once you log in, it autofills all of your contact info so it's really quick to sign up for events.
cons: Cons: Would be nice if you could see other events similar to the one you are looking at, the way Amazon shows you similar products.

title: User friendly, quick invites
name: Bethany F.
pros: Pros: I enjoy the easily customizable invites and the "text to invite" feature.
cons: Cons: I have not had any issues with this product.

title: Eventbrite is a great way to purchase tickets for events
name: Ari G.
position: Certified Advanced Rolfer / Myoskeletal Alignment Therapist
pros: Pros: I like the interface, the simplicity, the visual design, and the functionality. Eventbrite is a well designed application that makes event tickets a breeze to purchase.
cons: Cons: The application could help offer more incentives and discounts, and offer more tools to look for events by category.

title: Great link to your calendar
name: Verified Reviewer
position: Certified Advanced Rolfer / Myoskeletal Alignment Therapist
pros: Pros: The calendar function. Once you've said yes to an event you can add it to your calendar. Great.
cons: Cons: I can't seem to figure out how Eventbrite can remember my settings. I have to put in my credentials every time I say yes to attending something.
overall: Overall: Great way of putting events into your calendar.

title: Organizing events or meetup was pain but not with Eventbrite
name: Verified Reviewer
position: Certified Advanced Rolfer / Myoskeletal Alignment Therapist
pros: Pros: I like the user interface and the opportunity to organize events, followup with the participant also send them reminders
cons: Cons: the Current UX is the worst the UX before this was better , everybody is not artist also coming from IT performance and familiarity if the tool is priority

title: Good product
name: Thomas B.
comments: Comments: Easy to set up your event.
pros: Pros: Easy to use to set up your event. Intuitive design.
cons: Cons: Nothing to report here. Worked as it had hoped.

title: Great product
name: Danielle S.
pros: Pros: Easy to book tickets for smaller independent events. Easy to search for tickets in your city. Checkout process is easy to use. Event reminders when approaching date are helpful too.
cons: Cons: As a user it has been very helpful to use and can't speak to setting up events on it.

title: Our go-to event registration tool
name: Sara E.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite does it all! It's super easy to use, and the flexibility and functionality allows us to utilize it for free and paid events. Even if you have one event happening multiple times, Eventbrite makes it easy for people to choose their date and get the information they need.

title: Plan your work events with ease
name: Hayden Y.
pros: Pros: This is great to send out an invite for the company BBQ or Christmas party. You can get a headcount much easier than sending an Outlook calendar invite or doing a headcount. Reminders and updates are simple.
cons: Cons: I don't have anything to comment on cons.
overall: Overall: Planning work events.

title: Eventbrite Review
name: Michele P.
pros: Pros: The website it fun and appealing to the user. It defaults to your current city and prompts you to search for current events. When posting events, it caters towards younger generations.
cons: Cons: If you are hosting an event with those who definitely have a smartphone and younger generations then this site will work swimmingly for your gathering. However, it may be challenging to obtain tickets/check ins without an electronic device.

title: Makes organizing an event easier
name: Kristy O.
pros: Pros: The interface is really clean and it's easy to set up an event. Allows for customization and promotion of event. Easy to share.
cons: Cons: The price would be the only thing. It's percentage based, but honestly, worth every penny to take the work out organizing this portion of the event.

title: I use this when hosting events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I love that they only take a percentage when you are charging your attendees for tickets; free events are free for us to use eventbrite!
cons: Cons: I have NO problems with this software. It keeps me organized! .

title: It is very easy to set up and very easy for those registering to attend your event.
name: Anna F.
pros: Pros: It's ease of use and how you can personlise it to your companies look and feel. People are also very famililar with event brite and are happy to use it and sign up.
cons: Cons: If you are running break out rooms and mini events it's difficult to break down the eventbrite invitation. The page showing you has registered isn't very easy to understand. It's only ideal for small and easy events.
overall: Overall: Easy to use. Reduces time managing registrations. Low cost. No spreadsheets!!

title: Really easy from the customer side
name: Amanda B.
pros: Pros: I've used this mostly to purchase tickets, and have the app. It's easy to use and pick seats. It's realia L1E and easy to retrieve the ticket.
cons: Cons: There's usually a few but it's not too much and it's expected. I definitely wouldn't avoid purchasing tickets because of it.

title: This is a great site
name: Erica H.
comments: Comments: I really like Eventbrite.
pros: Pros: Ease of use, You are able to reach so many people.
cons: Cons: I have no cons about the site or software.

title: Best and easier tool to organize events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros:
Pros: Organize events is not part our day jobs, we just do it occasionally and every time, it was a nightmare and a task no one from the team wanted to do as it was usually time consuming. Since we discovered Eventbrite, it has become very easy and we get our events organized in less than half of the time.

The Interface is very straightforward so you can set up an event in just a few minutes and also manage all the ticketing/registration data in one place.
cons:
Cons: For free events it works perfect for us but when it comes to paid events, fees can be very high

Less important, but other point that can be improved are the customization options (font/colour)as at the moment they are very reduced which make the presentation of the events to look very similar one after the other
overall: Overall: My overall experience with Eventbrite has been very good so far as everyone can use it and have an event set up in no time even for people who does not do the event planning as an everyday job

title: Eventbrite makes organizing events easy as pie
name: Mike D.
pros: Pros: I enjoy how eventbrite can be used for so many different types of events. I have used it for concerts and conferences multiple times and have never had any issues. The ability for you to have a digital ticket on your phone saves you the hassle of making sure you have the tickets. Also I like how this is a sustainable way for the usage of tickets.
cons: Cons: No real cons on this software it is easy and great for events.

title: Eventbrite is a simple way to sign up and schedule events
name: Jonathan K.
comments: Comments: Eventbrite was very simple to use and effectively completed the tasks it is trying to facilitate.
pros: Pros: - Sign up was very simple and I never had trouble navigating the software - Event details were clearly marked and I could find everything I needed - Notifications and reminders available for keeping you on time
cons: Cons: - The software interface could look a bit more modern - The event details on the app were much easier to find than on a desktop computer

title: Event Mangement!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Makes running events easy. Ticket your event to make it feel more epic or simply manage attendance, this does it all!
cons: Cons: Doesn't have a lot of options to promote your event, just a tool to keep track of who you convinced to come.
overall: Overall: Far more effective than just a social media event page.

title: This is the platform I use for
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to use and search for events you are most likely to attend. Sync between web and app works perfect.
cons: Cons: Despite the fact the the app works great, updates are a bit larger than I would like. You don't use the app that often to have update notifications every couple of days.

title: Seamless way of registering for an event
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Appreciate the platform's functionality to invite friends and others to events, and also discover local events in your area.
cons: Cons: Flexibility with registration - it'd be nice if there was flexibility to change the names of registered attendees after submitting attendance.

title: Incredibly convenient
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Great way to organize the invitee and attendees for any event. App works great, website is easy to maneuver, and is free!

title: Great for events
name: Olivia P.
pros: Pros: I like how every event is listed and how you can change the dates and location when searching.
cons: Cons: Everything is great but if there were more events that would be better
overall: Overall: It has been great so far. I have been learning about cool events through here.

title: Eventbrite- There are Better Programs
name: Kelly V.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite has a lot of features that other ticketing programs (like an easier option for multi-tiered event levels), but produces a less user-friendly final product. We received many questions about the events listed on Eventbrite from users hoping to purchase tickets.
cons: Cons: The fee is higher than other programs (like TicketsToday) and the customer page is too complicated for the average consumer.
overall: Overall: Eventbrite has great extra features and the cost for that is reflected in their fee. Our customers were unable to navigate the site as well as others.

title: A very intuitive and easy to use event management tool for the masses
name: Alex W.
pros: Pros: It is very easy to set up an event and gets guests registered. For no-fee events it is great.
cons: Cons: The fees for paid events are more than other competitors. Since I generally use this for non-profits, this can be an issue
overall: Overall: I use this for several non-profits events that I volunteer for.

title: Best Over all Event Registration Package
name: Joselin M.
comments: Comments: As the founder of BostonTweetUp, an event planning and promotional service, and a networker that goes to 2-3 / night I have found Eventbrite to be one of the easiest and must feature rich event registration tools in the market. Since my role is both an event organizer as well as an attendee I review and use products that can handle at least those persprectives very well. I was an early adopter of the product and have been recommending the product to almost all the event organizers I work with. I highly recommend the current product and I'm also looking forward to hearing about the new things they have in store.

title: Eventbrite for business seminars
name: Brad G.
pros: Pros: A very good way to track and manage upcoming seminars and meetings. Billing is simple to use and straight forward. Reminders are invaluable as well as calendar input.
cons: Cons: No cons about this product at all. The functionality and ease of use set it up for success.

title: Great for Large Events
name: Nicole P.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is great for organizing large event registration. My experience has also been very smooth as an attendee.
cons: Cons: There is not a lot of customization possible, and the standard options don't work well for all event types.

title: Easy to use, but has some drawbacks weighing down the saved effort
name: Adelyn C.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite handles all of the different ticketing prices and types that you could want, and is very easy to maneuver. It also is easy to advertise and has a great user interface. It's also easy to use Eventbrite to market as it provides you with many different options for where to put your event's advertisements.
cons: Cons: It is frustrating sometimes to use Eventbrite because it charges a lot of fees for what it wants to do. Sometimes it seems as if it might actually be more effective just to build the ticketing system yourself or to find other ways to market your event.

title: good software
name: Nehal H.
pros: Pros: The only thing I can think of is software is such a great tool for me to use and handle my business with few clicks
cons: Cons: The time of proceses is not a good thing of this software and the function of page is too much in the same one

title: GREAT FOR FINDING THINGS TO DO
name: Eric C.
pros: Pros: Great reviews and very easy to use. You also can find out about a different variety of events
cons: Cons: To be honest I like everything about it , it can be an Improvement on customer support
overall: Overall: Help me find tickets to a few concerts and festivals I like how it has local events and national events

title: Mobile App Didn't Work
name: Jessica R.
pros: Pros: Seems good for finding and promoting events in a particular area, and for the most part it has worked well for me as an event attendee.
cons: Cons: Today when I tried to register for the Software Advice SXSA Party, I downloaded the mobile app and was not able to choose a quantity of tickets. Which meant I wasn't able to register for the event. The moble website worked, but the app didn't. At all.

title: Good, easy to use design
name: Hank F.
pros: Pros: Less fees than competitors! I also like that the interface of the ticketing page is simple and easy to navigate.
cons: Cons: Still charging fees to use. I don't really understand why presale tickets for events need to be so much more expensive than buying at the box office.

title: Master of Events
name: Reese D.
pros: Pros: I love how easy it is to organize your event with Eventbrite and issue tickets, even for free events. It lets you track who's coming and check them in easily with the iOS app.
cons: Cons: Adding more functionality to the iOS app would be a good start but overall, great!

title: Organized Events
name: Gabrielle B.
pros: Pros: I am a huge fan of Event Brite in my professional and personal life. With a simple search, you can find every event in your surrounding area. This site came in handy creating an event calendar for my job. I was able to locate various networking events. Additionally, I was able to reach a wider audience when hosting an event for my organization.
cons: Cons: I feel that some of the events are over priced but that is not the fault of the software. There are not a lot of options when it comes to refunds. Once you purchase tickets, it is a hassle getting the money back.

title: organize what you want
name: Nohelvis M.
pros: Pros: this platform helps create events demonstrating to the users security, charge before the event making offers and thus attract more users
cons: Cons: So far I do not know what I do not like about this platform, but I think it's very intuitive and useful when creating an event

title: Good event planning program
name: Nasira C.
pros: Pros: Can send invites digitally and easily track RSVPs. It's also nice to be able to send messages to guests about event updates!
cons: Cons: Fees apply based on number of invitees. Limited options for event designs. Frequent messages sent from software to event owner and attendees.

title: Eventbrite Helped us with TEDxRuakura
name: Chris H.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It was a simple but effective set up which allowed us to share and book throughout social media
cons: Cons: Getting paid after the event is difficult for a non-profit. If we could get at least some of the money from pre-sales before the event it would help with cashflow for getting many elements of the event.
overall: Overall: Our team found it quite easy to set up and share through social media to get bookings. There was a bit of fiddling to get the "free tickets" we needed to give to sponsors and special guests, (fortunately I didn't have to handle that).
