Ultimately we decided the following year to find another ticketing solution that would allow us to utilise some of the pre-sales to help fund preparation for the event.

title: Used to sell tickets for TEDxDesignTechHighSchool.
name: Adelyn C.
pros: Pros: It's easy to set up a page for your event, and easy to advertise. It's great that you can edit the URL for your page, so that it's easier to remember than something with too many numbers, etc. I also really like that you can do different ticket types, and that the payout method is rather easy.
cons: Cons: It costs extra money to do many things such as using separate ticket types and you also aren't able to change your payout type once you have sold your first ticket (EventBrite Payment Processing vs. PayPal, etc). Also, the whole QR code check-in process is quite complicated.

title: I Love EventBrite!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite helps you collect all customer information you need for events. Ticket purchasing is super easy. And customization for the event pages is sweet!
cons: Cons: There is nothing that I have come across on this software that I do not like. Eventbrite is a great tool.

title: Ubiquitous ticketing system
name: Chirag J.
pros: Pros: The range of events that the system has and vice versa almost any events ticket sale can be coordinated via Eventbrite
cons: Cons: The mobile UI is a bit unconventional and hence difficult the get around.
overall: Overall: The experience has been fairly good, no complaints but no extraordinary good features

title: Easy Interface
name: Pete M.
pros: Pros: Very intuitive to post events and track registrants in the platform. Pleasing visual display as well.
cons: Cons: Hard to manage exports of data. Once you know where to go its easy, but feels like it shouldn't be so challenging to export basic information.
overall: Overall: Serves us well.

title: Great Software
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: This software is excellent for purchasing and selling event tickets. This works for free events as well. People can access this software from any electronic device and have access to their tickets.
cons: Cons: I have not encountered any problems with this software.

title: Eventbrite is great
name: Meliss W.
pros: Pros: Easy to use and manage tickets and events
cons: Cons: Not a lot of room for customization and other template designs

title: Easy Way to Find & Sign Up For Events!
name: Lea N.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite makes it easy to find local events. I like that it lets you search by event type and location and create a free profile to manage your tickets.
cons: Cons: I have not had any issues using Eventbrite so far so there's nothing I can think of as a con at the moment.

title: Eventbrite Review
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Ease of use, user friendly, well laid out webpage
cons: Cons: I have absolutely no criticisms of the software
overall: Overall: Positive

title: Courses I've signed up for used this service for admission and communication
name: Sam E.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I signed up for a continuing education course using this website. On the day of the event it made finding my ticket very easy. The event hosts also used this service to send communication to attendees. Each of these correspondance emails included the downloadable mobile ticket, the address of the event with links to google maps, and the information from the host. This made it extremely easy to find everything I needed on the day of the event.
cons: Cons: I found zero cons with this software. I really liked the service and would use it again. It was a pleasure to use compared to other ticket services.

title: No Complaints
name: Molly L.
pros: Pros: As a use, Eventbrite is easy to use with a clear and neat interface. Information is easy to find compared to other websites. I like that you can reserve tickets for the event through the site as well.
cons: Cons: I don't have any negative feedback at this time.

title: I love eventbrite
name: Bronson V.
pros: Pros: So easy to use, set up, track sales and collect payments for events
cons: Cons: i wish there were more event themes for the event pages but it gets the job done well anyways
overall: Overall: I use to set up leadership luncheons events. It allows me to better see attendance so I can better plan catering and seating

title: Get you Dates right!!
name: ANISH R.
pros: Pros: This is a very nice platform for getting updates about the events happening and getting the tickets for that instead of searching for them here and there.
cons: Cons: May be more user friendly platform and few more features.

title: Eventbrite
name: Rebeka S.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is very intuitive. It's very easy to create registration options for events that often are more user friendly for the participants than standby registration platforms.
cons: Cons: Sometimes the fees involved with using the platform feel imbalanced.

title: Eventbrite is an affordable option for event ticketing especially for non-profits.
name: Christina P.
pros: Pros: The ability to create multiple types of tickets for various events, helps ensure we are planning for the appropriate number of people.
cons: Cons: The only option to collect payment is currently pay pal which charges a fee, adding other options such a donor box would be helpful!

title: I use Eventbrite for most of my invitations
name: Racquel P.
pros: Pros: I like that this software allows me to invite many people to an event at one time, I can keep up with rsvp's, comments and pictures all in the same place!
cons: Cons: The description section on the invitation does not allow for a lot of information to be added.

title: Amazing software!
name: Cynthia D.
pros: Pros: With just a few clicks you can be signed up to dozens of events in your local city/town.
cons: Cons: I like everything about this software, no complaints from me.
overall: Overall: Like the fact that I can sign up to as many events that I would like to join in on.

title: Good event platform with room for improvement
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: We used Eventbrite on a conference website and it is a great event platform overall with things like discounted tickets and online payments.
cons: Cons: The embedable widgets are rather basic with few customization options.

title: Perfect for political events and parties
name: Nathan R.
position: Director, Executive Projects (Office of the DHS Director)
pros: Pros: The app is easy to use and intuitive. It didn't have a steel learning curve. I spent maybe 10 minutes setting up my event, or less.
cons: Cons: I would like to see more options around selecting pictures to customize my event page. For example, editing the picture background.

title: event brite
name: Catherine S.
pros: Pros: We can advertise events easily and for low cost.
cons: Cons: The man power required to set up the event info.

title: Easy RSVP's
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Event tickets are easy to find/store on your phone and RSVP for events is easy because your information is saved once you create an account.
cons: Cons: I do not like the emails I receive about events that I am not interested in after signing up for an account.

title: Wonderful!
name: Geraldo J.
pros: Pros: Great and very well organized tool to have to organize and event. Needless to say that it definitely is one of the best tools out there.
cons: Cons: We have had absolutely no problems whatsoever with them, even the customer service is very welcoming and knowledgable.

title: Eventbrite worked for what I needed
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The event I wanted to attend was available through Eventbrite and it had all the information on it that I needed.
cons: Cons: It was just a little clunky but they've been making it better with updates.
overall: Overall: It worked well when I needed to RSVP to the event and find the info about it.

title: Easy to use
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I like that I can book event tickets and pay for them in one app and I don't need to print a ticket, can just show my smartphone
cons: Cons: Sometimes it shows that my old events are still "upcoming" - this is confusing. Recommendation system is not always relevant to me

title: Event management made easy
name: Jay D.
pros: Pros: The analytics/dashboard overview. This made it very easy to stay on top of your event and easily get a feel for the performance of your marketing/ticket sales. It also makes it easy to manage any aspect of your event.
cons: Cons: I am yet to come across anything that I dislike about this software. It works well and has all the functions one might expect from an events management software.
overall: Overall: The new feature of being able to integrate with Facebook has been huge for us in promoting events. Overall, I've found it much easier to plan and manage events with Eventbrite. It takes so many admin style tasks off the table.

title: use to book meetings
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: This has been an easy enough app to use, simple way to access events and pay for them in the app. Emails with updates for other events I might also enjoy.
cons: Cons: there has been formatting issues at times with some of the smaller meetings that are not professional

title: Strong event solution
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to use, intuitive, lots of great integrations
cons: Cons: I didn't have any problems with Eventbrite!

title: Easy way to get RSVPs
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It is easy to RSVP for events. The reminder email that eventbrite sends the day of the event is a great way to boost turnout.
cons: Cons: You need another platform (such as facebook, instagram) to raise awareness about the event which requires referring people to eventbrite to register, which adds another step. This is especially cumbersome when people find the event through a poster or flyer instead of on the internet.

title: Great product!
name: Colleen O.
pros: Pros: Easy to track invites and RSVPs, great exportable lists, and very intuitive functionality. Really impressed!
cons: Cons: Maybe I'm just not using it in the correct way, but you should be able to view people who aren't attending.

title: Great event platform with a wide reach
name: Victoria M.
pros: Pros: The event discovery platform is invaluable to promoting local events. The software is is intuitive enough for all members of our team.
cons: Cons: We have been encountering problems with the Facebook integration, but the eventbrite team is working to solve them.

title: Automated resort activity sign-ups
name: MARK J.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Reporting is great. very detailed. fairly easy to learn and set up.
cons: Cons: Limited ability to customize. Registering multiple people at the same time is a bit of an issue. system preference each person to register.

title: Exactly what we needed
name: Eve A.
pros: Pros: Planning and managing events was a huge hassle, but Eventbrite has helped us streamline our process. It's so simple to register guests and track their responses. The customization is wonderful, let us do exactly what we needed with it, and the website integration has been fantastic.
cons: Cons: Customer Service can be slow to respond, which is stressful when you're trying to get an event off the ground

title: Good Event Posting Solution
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I like that you are able to create events and share via various channels your event. I love that it is free!
cons: Cons: Features are limited but you are not paying for it so this can be a wash. I would like to see if there is a way for a new user experience.

title: Great for tickets!
name: Kiana D.
pros: Pros: I think this is a really easy place to get tickets from, and it doesn't make you sign up for certain things, which I think is really nice.
cons: Cons: I haven't had any issues with this so far. It's nice knowing my tickets wont get lost with this software.

title: I use Eventbrite to find local events and seminars.
name: Roberta E.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is brilliant. It's simple to use and includes a variety of events based on different interests. I came across several events with no issue and obtaining tickets is a breeze. They are conveniently available within the app, so there's no need to print paper tickets. I like that it sends notifications of upcoming events that I may be interested in attending.
cons: Cons: The search function has room for improvement and it would be helpful to get suggestions for events in major cities as well. Events that I've "liked" often hadn't been saved.

title: Eventbrite - Application to but event and tickets online
name: Manish T.
pros: Pros: 1) No extra charges to customers 2) Easy to use - On mobile and desktop 3) easy to make decision on tickets because of great UI
cons: Cons: 1) Technical and customer support could be improved 2) Sometime techincal issues while doing payment leading to frustration

title: Easy to set up your own event, easy to attend events
name: Andy H.
comments: Comments: I love eventbrite and i love attending events that people use eventbrite to set up. I have setup a couple of events and it is easy to enter all the information and set up tickets. They handle all the sales of tickets and everything you need. From an organizer perspective, day of checking in and verifying tickets is also a breeze using their mobile apps. You can have your ticket checkers / entry folks download the apps and sign in to your event and scan customer tickets / phones, OR look up the customers in a list and make sure they're allowed in.

title: The easiest ticket site I've ever used!!
name: Marquise E.
pros: Pros: What I like most about this ticket purchase website is how easy it is to use!! Also I got notified immediately after the ticket purchase
cons: Cons: It would be better to see more advertising for this company so that i could tell people more about it without them being confused

title: Easy for all parties
name: Bri L.
pros: Pros: I like the convience of being able to sign up for an event or on the other end to keep track of attendees.
cons: Cons: I don't have any negative comments about Eventbrite
overall: Overall: It is helpful for both event planners and event attendees. It is also great you can use it on a smartphone.

title: Easy to use
name: Christian W.
pros: Pros: Really easy to use. Just follow instructions.
cons: Cons: It always require a login. Limited events.

title: The best event platform, period!
name: Ben L.
pros: Pros: I have used Eventbrite for years to organise my events. The fee structure is low and fair, and gives you free marketing through its powerful Google presence.
cons: Cons: No major complaints - it does everything I need it to at a very reasonable price.

title: Eventbrite
name: JaVon A.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite helps me know what's going on in any city I visit to make sure I have a good time.
cons: Cons: Eventbrite only has a limited amount of filters which makes it difficult to pinpoint totally specific venues that offer the services I want to visit.

title: Eventbrite
name: Cristian C.
pros: Pros: What I like most about this program is that it integrates well with Facebook, Mailchimp, and Wordpress.
cons: Cons: What I least like about this program was the end of the referral program which makes it less beneficial to promote through this program.

title: THis is how to do seminars
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: free options for when you need a head count but do not need it to be customer facing
cons: Cons: has sooo many options that sometimes it is confusing
overall: Overall: We host seminars, events and training at a dealership. we use this to get a rough head count to prepare for these types of events.

title: Moving to a new city? Eventbrite is amazing in connecting with people
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I love that they keep you updated via email on tickets and the ease of use of the App to get bookings
cons: Cons: Sometimes the quality of the events and people are not always as advertised which can be disappointing

title: A great help, at a cost!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I loved the Faebook integration that allowed me to easily advertise to my friends and then link the, to pay directly on the Eventbrite site.
cons: Cons: People complained about the added fee (myself included) on top of the price of the admission.

title: EventBrite make my days Brite!
name: Kayla S.
pros: Pros: This platform is not only easy to plan events, but also very easy to following other events so that you're not missing anything.
cons: Cons: I cannot think of a con right now. I would say to watch out for scam events so that you don't get ripped off.

title: New to the app
name: Angela S.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It list some fun events in the area. Its easy to go through the items and search for items to do. I
cons: Cons: I wish there was more events listed in the area. Also, to include the whole Central Texas area and then expand statewide

title: Great for a party
name: Brenda B.
comments: Comments: Easy to use and attractive. Easy to set up and to integrate with existing lists.
pros: Pros: Easiness in useage
cons: Cons: Need more event covers

title: Great platform!
name: Derek B.
comments: Comments: Would love to see options for merchandise pairing at time of ticket sale - but all works really well!
pros: Pros: Easy to get started using

title: Versatile, convenient, and easy to use
name: Young L.
pros: Pros: It is very versatile; you can use this software for fundraisers, lectures, webinars, or parties. I like how Eventbrite provides analytics as well so you can see when/why there was a sudden surge in attendance/sales. I like how Eventbrite can also track ticket sales and notify you when the payout/check was sent.
cons: Cons: Not much I dislike. If anything, I wish there were less fees applied to the tickets sold (a certain percentage taken for credit card processing, flat fee per ticket and 2.5% taken from ticket price).
overall: Overall: Generally good, no real complaints.

title: Easy way to buy AND sell
name: Halle L.
pros: Pros: It provided an easy and efficient platform to buy and sell tickets. For example, I Purchased tickets to an influencer event and it was so easy and quick- took maybe 3 minutes.
cons: Cons: It doesn't provide access to larger events like concerts

title: Account Executive
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: As an active person, I love seeing all the events in the city and being able to look at them based on dates, locations, categories, etc.
cons: Cons: Nothing. I suggest this for people new to cities to get out an see the city and meet people.

title: Eventbrite for Church Events
name: Sarah C.
pros: Pros: Super easy to use. So helpful to have a central hub to buy tickets for church events. Saves so much time and e-mails for admin staff.
cons: Cons: No cons at this point, this tool helps sell tickets smoothly.
overall: Overall: Amazing, simple, easy-to-use, time-saver.

title: Great for SXSW planning
name: Nadia H.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Accessibility and functionality is wonderful! I used the app this morning to rsvp for parties and it came in hand.
cons: Cons: Sometimes the app is a little slow but it really is of no inconvenience to me so i didn't mind at all

title: Eventbrite is excellent across the board!
name: Amanda B.
comments: Comments: Eventbrite is my go to source for all my event publishing and promotion needs. I run a small non-profit that throws weekly events. Eventbrite makes it easy to publish events (that look beautiful!), manage events, and promote events. Since using Eventbrite as our platform for ticket sales, we've seen a huge increase with new users because of their own marketing tools (which are easy to track). Additionally, their customer service is 5 stars and the reports/search mechanisms available are top notch. I truly love being an Eventbrite user and highly recommend their services.

title: Eventbrite too
name: Carol C.
comments: Comments: It is a easy way to send out invitations to events and get responses.
pros: Pros: Very easy to use and you receive your confirmation immediately. It is also appears in my g-mail schedule of events.
cons: Cons: There isn't anything to Not like. It is a very product.

title: Very useful tool for a nonprofit - great customer service and good improvements over the years.
name: Rachel M.
pros: Pros: Selling different types of tickets (including promo codes), customizing order form and exporting attendee lists.
cons: Cons: The payment processing options are a bit restrictive and some of the ways to export spreadsheets are a little convoluted.

title: EventBrite
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I liked that it was a free service. I worked for a nonprofit, so our budget was very limited. Also tracking attendees and the ablility to print a RSVP list for the event was so helpful!
cons: Cons: Sometimes I found it clunky to work with, especially if I was trying to make several diffferent offers or packages per each event.
overall: Overall: Overall I think EventBrite does an awesome job - both as an event host and a user.

title: Great Platform For Event Hosting
name: Mike S.
pros: Pros: One of the fastest and easiest ways to create and promote an event in your local area.
cons: Cons: Would be nice if there was more customization options on the actual design of the page.
overall: Overall: The set-up experience and seamless. Even non-techies can use this service.

title: Easy to use Event Management
name: Bryan M.
comments: Comments: Since our events are free and open to the public, Eventbrite is a great option to track our attendees and get more attention for our event.
pros: Pros: The formatting and features were straight forward and easy to use. Easy to track the events and RSVP. Able to publicly post events to Eventbrite audience to attract more attendees.
cons: Cons: High transaction fees for paid events and some of the settings are difficult to change.

title: eventbrite makes events easy
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I've attended several events which distribute tickets through Eventbrite. It's easy to RSVP, access tickets, see event info, and even change RSVP status if plans change.
cons: Cons: I have only had good experiences with this software!

title: Event planning got even better
name: Adria A.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is increible for event planning. The software is very friendly and has all the features necessary to plan the events, set the dates and sell tickets. It also has amazing features for clients, such as, the app. The app will the the user what, where and when to go to the event.
cons: Cons: I think there is nothing to improve. I like pretty much everything about this software

title: Ease of use for small events
name: manda s.
pros: Pros: I like the accessibility to the platform to me and all my event members from anywhere.
cons: Cons: Some of the online features are not user friendly. However, I did use the free version which is bound to have limits.

title: It's easy to use
name: Morgan B.
comments: Comments: I do like event brite but it's kinda confusing
pros: Pros: It's very user friendly and very relevant to my age group because I attend a lot of events and concerts.
cons: Cons: If you want to get a refund for the event, its tough because do you contact event brite or the ticket holder?

title: Great program to set up events.
name: Diana T.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: It's very convenient for setting up events. The app version helps with managing said event as well. You can easily check in the guests and enter in any people who didn't sign up. It also exports the information very neatly for you so you can collect information for future reference. You can also connect the app to other programs to send invites.
cons: Cons: The interface could have some more work. For example, in the app version when checking in you just swipe the person. But if there's a lot of people, you take a lot of time searching for the name even if it's typeable.

title: Great platform to start getting exposure for your event
name: John L.
pros: Pros: I've used Eventbrite to recruit interested in my sports team. Generally low maintenance, this platform lets you customize your event from type of ticketing/rsvp to occurrences.
cons: Cons: My main problem when the platform in the past was when I tried to cancel an event. When attempting to cancel my free event, the platform would not allow me to do so because people had rsvp'd. While I understand the need to restrict quick cancellation of paid events, this should not be required for free rsvp events.
overall: Overall: Gained exposure to my event. Successfully recited new members.

title: Reliable and No Fuss
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to set up. Very user-friendly. Easy to check on ticket sales and professional dashboard for ticket buyers.
cons: Cons: I can't say I found anything that I did not like in this software.
overall: Overall: I had purchased tickets before with Eventbrite and found it easy to work with. I recently set up an event and sold tickets through the app. As someone who has sold tickets manually without the aid of a computer program, I was blown away by the easy setup process and thrilled with the simplicity of checking on ticket sales. Following the event, Eventbrite was very expeditious in sending ticket sale funds to my account. I would highly recommend this app!

title: Eventbrite
name: Brittany N.
pros: Pros: I love that this program allows me to easily find and purchase tickets for events in my area.
cons: Cons: Sometimes I have a hard time finding my ticket inside the app.
overall: Overall: I love that this product is easy to use in purchasing tickets for local events.

title: Easy & Convenient
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Using Eventbrite is an easy and convenient way to organize and plan any event.
cons: Cons: Eventbrite provides the solution needed for planning an event online. No cons to speak of.
overall: Overall: Eventbrite makes it easy and saves time when planning an event online.

title: Gets the job done
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy way to create, manage and track events, attendance, etc.
cons: Cons: Somewhat buggy - often have clients saying they aren't able to access the page, or register properly, etc. Support is usually very good in resolving these issues.

title: I have used Eventbrite on a couple of occasions and had a great experience.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The ease of Use of the platform and seamless integration into my calendars. A really great application that should be utilized more often by businesses.
cons: Cons: There is really not much to not like about the application, but I think that users can do a better job of event description and dating when using it.
overall: Overall: Easy way to sign attendees up for an event and track them the numbers for preparation purposes as well!

title: Eventbrite
name: Allison B.
position: Assistant Director, Digital Marketing and Data Strategies
pros: Pros: It's very easy to get started, and people are aware of the brand and willing to use it. Good reminder options as well.
cons: Cons: Eventbrite doesn't integrate with the CRM we use, so we had to do everything manually on the back end.

title: Great event management platform
name: Dolores R.
comments: Comments: Love it great to plan an event!
pros: Pros: Great event management platform because it automates the confirmation and ticket process of your event, and integrates with CRMs.
cons: Cons: I would like the ability to customize the ticket, but not a must.

title: Eventbrite is a go to for me when planning events
name: Trish F.
comments: Comments: Eventbrite is a go to for me when planning events, everything from happy hours to conferences. And especially repeat events since it's so easy to copy an event and adjust the settings.

title: Where I turn to for things to do
name: Alice L.
pros: Pros: I love that they offer events from every big city. I never run out of things to do, especially for small lesser known events.
cons: Cons: There is nothing about Eventbrite that I do not like.

title: Eventbrite
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: This a very easy software to learn and utilize for any events you may be planning and create and easy payment structure.
cons: Cons: I have had this software sometimes have errors and not load up once payment is put it, which does make me think that maybe it was not received until the confirmation email comes in.
overall: Overall: All in all, I have enjoyed using this and will continue to use and recommend this in the future.

title: Great tool for event registration and marketing
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to use, cost effective, great interaction between attendees and host!
cons: Cons: nothing - very pleased with the capabilities of EventBrite!
overall: Overall: It has helped us connect with guests for events and for them to interact with us, leading to greater engagement.

title: Perfect for group events!
name: Jered R.
pros: Pros: We recently had a large company wide event with over 3000 people and it was PERFECT for it!! Made organization so easy!
cons: Cons: Don't have anything bad to say! It was easy to set up, easy to share, and easy to use in general! Great!

title: We use Eventbrite for ticketing purposes as our development database does not offer this service.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to design an attractive webpage, reports are simple to read. Can use for free activities not just paid tickets.
cons: Cons: Data does not import directly into our system - have to re-enter ticket purchases in central development database

title: Event brite is effective
name: Jennifer M.
pros: Pros: I have used eventbrite to acquire tickets for events before along with various other sites, eventbrite makes it easy
cons: Cons: Sometimes the page will file out before I have finished my transaction
overall: Overall: Very good will use again in the future

title: Great product for band use.
name: Daniel Z.
comments: Comments: Get it!
pros: Pros: Very easy to use for bands of all genres. Stupid not to buy it. Buy it buy it buy it buy it buy it buy it
cons: Cons: No cons at all stupid not to buy. So easy to use and easily accessible. Couldn't be easier!

title: Very easy to purchase tickets on!
name: Megan P.
pros: Pros: I love the ease of purchasing tickets without the hassle of some of the larger ticket websites! Everything was easy and simple to use and check in at the events!
cons: Cons: I haven't had any issues when utilizing Eventbrite

title: Easy to use!
name: Susan K.
pros: Pros: Nice layout and easy to obtain information and updates in 1 place. Secure portal for safe transactions.
cons: Cons: I really do not have anything negative to say about this software at this time. I have used a few times without any issues!

title: Used this software for years, until discovering cheaper, more robust solutions
name: Justin H.
pros: Pros: I like that people are familiar with the name Eventbrite. It is a trusted brand that people can easily identify with.
cons: Cons: The transaction fees were steep. We were so thankful to discover another solution that offered cheaper rates and more functionality.
overall: Overall: We moved on from Eventbrite this last year and do not regret it.

title: Great for small events
name: Hilary K.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is an easy to use tool for setting up events. It's well known by attendees so it's simple for them to sign up. Love how it lets you check people in. I'm not sure of it's functionality of large groups as we have used it on 50-120 people.
cons: Cons: A few minor complaints: an attendee who didn't register but still shows up can't be easily checked in, the end date of ticket sales is set ten days after making the event so that has to be changed and you can't export the checked in attendee list to see who actually showed up easily.

title: Eventbrite is super easy to work with
name: Mike A.
comments: Comments: Overall being more efficient is the key and it helps us out.
pros: Pros: We like the ease of setting dates, appointments, meetings and events across the state.
cons: Cons: There's nothing Eventbrite can't handle.

title: Lots of events to pick from
name: Michelle M.
pros: Pros: I love that this is one app that allows you to search for events and buy tickets all within the same application.
cons: Cons: I don't have any cons for this app as it's easy to resolve any issues that you may have with the vendor.

title: Makes my events run smoothly
name: Rhonda L.
pros: Pros: It allows all event participants to register and check in with ease. No hastle and no papers involved.
cons: Cons: I don't like the fact that they hold they money until after the event without penalty. I usually need my funds as we go.

title: Best event finder
name: Roberto Maurizio P.
pros: Pros: The design of the platform is very appealing and enjoyable, it very easy to find, to promote and to join an event, and the best thing is that the service is for free.
cons: Cons: There is a lack of a good customer service.

title: My go to for events
name: Heather S.
pros: Pros: The site is very easy to maneuver when you upload pictures and enter information.
cons: Cons: If you don't enter your payout details it will be hard to get your money on time. And I feel like the percentage fee could be cheaper.

title: Our field offices use Eventbrite to send out invites to local events.
name: Rohit S.
pros: Pros: I like that it is intuitive, anyone can set up an event and easily track event registrations. They can also upload their own email list.
cons: Cons: I wish that the platform interacted better with existing CRM databases. We have a donor database with IDs and event attendance history, and I would like to be able to export data from Eventbrite in a format that can easily be uploaded to the database.

title: Average User
name: Kelly F.
pros: Pros: Easy to use if you are organizing a small event by yourself. It can handle basic registration functions.
cons: Cons: Once I registered through Eventbrite, I continue to get marketing emails. If I had known my email address would be used this way, I would have not registered for the event.
overall: Overall: I've used it registered for small meetings outside of my business. For the people administering Eventbrite, it's a good solution but for someone like me who handles registrations daily, you may need something more robust.

title: Too Expensive
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It is very easy to use and has better built-out features than Checkfront or other event booking programs.
cons: Cons: It is expensive. I opted for less functions with Checkfront but saved a ton of money on just one large event.

title: Eventbrite
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Very easy to use. Very affordable. Makes advertising and collecting fees for events a breeze.
cons: Cons: Great for simple events with limited options - the more complex your event is, the more cumbersome the software can be

title: We used Eventbrite to set up hiring events
name: Paul L.
pros: Pros: We used the free version of Eventbrite, as we did not charge for tickets to our event. We used it to promote hiring events and we got a decent turnout. We were able to get the word out about our open hiring event without having to spend money and the eventbrite system made it easy to share out with our social media.
cons: Cons: We had to make sure that we were all set for dates regarding the event. Setting it up in Eventbrite means that it would be difficult to change the date later as we had already gotten the word out.

title: An event platform for everyone
name: Lance B.
pros: Pros: I've used both the free and paid version of Eventbrite and I love them both. The platform offers so many great features to make your event go more smoothly, and look more professional. It helps a ton in management before, during and after the event.
cons: Cons: Paying per ticket fees isn't my favorite. I'd rather be charged a subscription fee and keep the additional fee.

title: most useful event website
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is very user-friendly, it very east to create an account and manage all your events. I love using the mobile app, saves time , and i don't have to always print out my ticket for something. My husband and I have used eventbrite tons of times to create events, and invite ppl for our business parties.
cons: Cons: Not really anything negative to say about eventbrite. Maybe add more information when someone is interested in attending our events, there should be a space for them to put their phone number as well..

title: Most Useful tool for Creating Events
name: Ganesh P.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I cherish that I can make an occasion in under two minutes! We have Health benefits everywhere throughout the nation and utilizing eventbrite causes me advertise my occasion to the neighborhoods. I can likewise include a picture which is additionally useful. Causes us demonstrate our image to individuals scanning for wellbeing administrations.
cons: Cons: I dont like is that when I get data of somebody who is occupied with going to our occasion, we are given a first and last name and email address yet no telephone number.

title: Bought tickets. No issues
name: Michele M.
pros: Pros: Great email alerts to when concerts or events are coming. Easy to use. Quick way to purchase tickets.
cons: Cons: Fees can be higher but I have noticed a lot of the other ticketing agencys are raising their fees as well.

title: Event Management & Organizing Made Simple
name: Verified Reviewer
pros:
Pros: The menu options are easy to use.

Tracking events that are scheduled, and events hosted are manageable.

Event organizing is simplified
cons: Cons: Difficult to access event history and tickets without having to log in.

title: Eventbrite is the future
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite's ticketing system is super-easy to use for the users and pretty easy to set up by the administrators.
cons: Cons: The back-end has a slight learning curve but once mastered, makes event registration very easy.

title: Promote Your Event
name: Brian S.
pros: Pros: You are able to promote your event in a very easy way.
cons: Cons: The percentage of cost can add up to a good amount.
overall:
Overall: We are able to promote any event in a very timely manner and have been able

to make it easy for our costumers to be a part of an event.

title: Eventbrite is the only software I use most to find running races near me, it's very user-friendly!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The software interface for the user if very clear and easy to navigate. It's on-point when you search for events near you and you receive relevant options from your search with plenty of choices. I also love that it offers one place to keep your tickets, instead of downloading them to your computer and having to frantically search for them again just before the event!
cons: Cons: The booking fees to use the software can be quite steep.
overall: Overall: Finding races I wouldn't have heard of otherwise and being able to store my tickets in one consolidated place.

title: Running an event ... Seriously consider this!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros:
Pros: Easy to use - Got it working in no time at all.

All the setting you need for ticket sales are there.
cons: Cons: Getting around is a little fiddly but everything is there.
overall:
Overall: Really good.

Will definitely use for the next ticketed event.

title: Makes event registration easy
name: Myra B.
pros: Pros: It's a great tool for tracking registrations for your event, big or small.
cons: Cons: Maybe it's a new option now, but I wish that it didn't always send attendees a ticket to print out, since not all events require that.

title: Best Event Planning Software
name: Sait Mesutcan I.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is so easy to use to plant events and since it's the most popular event planning app, everyone knows and uses it. Also, Eventbrite's UI is amazing.
cons: Cons: It's a bit costly compared to the alternatives.

title: Easy to use and super tech friendly
name: Chirag P.
pros: Pros: Amazing event application and website, super easy to use for those that aren't around a computer all day.
cons: Cons: Tough to navigate to your event sometimes and not friendly for those who don't own a smartphone for tickets.

title: Tickets to Events ...
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I have used Eventbrite off an on over the years. It's simple enough to use, and effective.
cons: Cons: I found it complicated to keep track of attendees, and make changes. Not impressed with paid event processing.
overall: Overall: Overall, I prefer to do my own event invitations directly on my website ... but this is a viable solution.

title: Very Solid Event/Ticketing Software
name: Sam M.
comments: Comments: User friendly. Overall a good UI. Wish there was a better way to review previous/ in-process RSVPs

title: FB integration
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The facebook integration with the events page made it extremely convenient for people who rely on fb calendar.
cons: Cons: to be honest it can be a little difficult to set up because theres not many customization options

title: Widely used, but costly fees
name: Jocelyn P.
pros: Pros: It is the best used event software, and so is widely recognized across the world. It is easy to distribute to mailing lists.
cons: Cons: Eventbrite charges a high percentage for ticket sales compared to other sites.

title: Robust Event Hosting Platform
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: - Easy to use and get started - Integrates with many other platforms (for me most important is HubSpot) - Easy to export data and customize fields - Great email reporting and post-event recaps
cons: Cons: - Limited features in the free plan, must upgrade and pay to get access to some very useful features. Other than that highly recommend it for basic event hosting needs.

title: Easy To Manage Event App
name: Javier M.
pros: Pros: I love the simplicity of the App by giving you the option to post an event that you're planning with the objective of more people to attend.
cons: Cons: I can honestly say that I do not dislike anything about this App.
overall: Overall: Im part of the activity committee who plan events in order to teach young college students about the importance of financial responsability in life so they can have a brighter and better future.

title: Eventbrite review
name: Zenab K.
pros: Pros: I've been using eventbrite for a while, it's easy to use and has lots of events that I can quickly find
cons: Cons: It could be a bit more user friendly, as it takes a few extra steps of i need to change the location.

title: Get your event done in minutes
name: Andres J.
pros: Pros: Easy to setup. Great tools for your event. Being listed on their webpage improved tickets sale without extra promotion.
cons: Cons: If you want to have custom html/css on you event page things could turn messy.

title: Easy
name: Sharon M.
pros: Pros: Ease of use. Convenience. There is a lot of information on different activities around town which makes it valuable.
cons: Cons: Sometimes its hard to find events outside of that there are no cons. We use it to organize our conference.

title: Best
name: Alex O.
pros: Pros: The fact that the software allows you to create events for free as long as attendance is free, makes it the best in its category
cons: Cons: I have not found any thing wrong with the software, it does the job.

title: A useful ticketing system easy to implement
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Probably the best thing about the product is how easy it is to set up a ticketing campaign for a major event
cons: Cons: In certain cities the quality of the events is pretty low - some content curation could be useful

title: THE platform for events!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to use. Mobile is strong - full functionality. Recognized across the industry. Great tool for discovering events.
cons: Cons: Understandable the company needs to make money but... no one likes service fees!

title: Hold An Event
name: Dan D.
pros: Pros: This software is very easy to use to host your event. You can go from never using it to having an event up in minutes. It is that simple.
cons: Cons: Nothing at all. Again, great software with easy to use design.
overall: Overall: We needed a way to host and schedule events in a simple an easy way. This software does just that. I would use it for any event. And, if your event is free the tool is free to use. Great for non-profits.

title: Good style
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The apearance of the event page is good, everything important is emphasised.
cons: Cons: That my country is not registerd and I could not have my account linked for payed events.

title: Easy tool for event registration
name: Scott K.
pros: Pros: Easy to use professional looking consistent ability for your event to be found by general public
cons: Cons: Wish there were more options for exporting data from event Wish it connected better with constant contact

title: Make your next registration event easy
name: John M.
pros: Pros: Very easy to set up an event and those wanting to attend can sign up connected directly through the app using their Facebook account and easily links to your Facebook events.
cons: Cons: As of right now I have not found anything that I dont like about it. The app on the phone is also easy use
overall: Overall: For any event that requires reservation and /or tickets I would recommend using this program

title: Eventbrite's free version is a blessing to track and register people for free events!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite shines with its free and low cost event ticketing features. I've mostly used it for free or comped events that involve simply checking people in off a list. There's an app or printable lists you can check off and live update as you go.
cons: Cons: Eventbrite gets more complicated with larger scale projects. I would definitely only use it for small or free events.

title: Great sw
name: Raghu K.
pros: Pros: Ease of use, connects with all browsers, works on mobile and regular operating systems, remembers your email
cons: Cons: Doesn't simplify the steps, sometimes doesn't allow copy paste and other simple features like connecting to calendar

title: Great Way to Market Events
name: Chanelle H.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is easy to navigate, has an attractive interface, and is a very seamless product.
cons: Cons: When there are too many people trying to get a ticket for something at once the site gets glitchy and SLOW.

title: Eventbrite
name: Kim S.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is easy to use and track who has received, viewed and responded to your event invitations.
cons: Cons: There is nothing I can think of that would be a con, in terms of the capacity that I have used Eventbrite.

title: Easy to use to create paid events
name: Melissa C.
pros: Pros: Easy to set up events and accept payment. Easy to create ticketing system for admission to events Easy to create a page and add it to Facebook or link in email. Ability to purchase tickets straight off of the site.
cons: Cons: There are no cons at this time. The functionality is great and is easy to use. There is customizable text and images for your invite.

title: Eventbrite is easy
name: Kenny J.
comments: Comments: I have used dozens of similar applications for event invitation management and this is one of my favorites. The interface is easy and the updates are unobtrusive. I like how easy it is to use from a standpoint of sending out event invitations, as well as receiving invitations and updates.

title: More than just event planning
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It is so easy to sign up for events and to plan events. The ease of use takes a lot of stress off the organization putting on the event.
cons: Cons: It is sometimes hard to contact the host through this software. You cannot do it directly - sometimes it goes through the website only.
overall: Overall: Utilizing this software is easy for the end user as well as the person planning the event. Thank you!!

title: Wonderful
name: Tobe A.
pros: Pros: The best part about this service is you don't have to pay if the even you are organizing is free.
cons: Cons: The user interface can be made more interactive, apart from that, the software works just fine.

title: Love it! Easy and Fun to Use
name: Katy M.
pros: Pros: Love using this to create events for our real estate firm. It's a breeze to set up and integrate with social media. It's really easy to use and has so many features. I love the spreadsheets too!
cons: Cons: I think you have to use it frequently to understand all the ins and outs of how the app works and how to use it to its fullest potential. It just takes a little time the first try.

title: Promotions Made Easy
name: Samuel P.
pros: Pros: When you're promoting an event or selling tickets, this tool really makes it easy for me. Not to mention it's easy to add onto the list of recipients.
cons: Cons: I wish there was more visibility on all data.

title: Eventbrite Review
name: Alysha P.
pros: Pros: I love making event invitations and tracking RSVP's online, for free!!
cons: Cons: I don't know that this is a con for the software or the email accounts they are sent to, but it seems they typically go to spam.

title: EventBrite makes event registration easy!
name: Dale G.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is easy to use, makes ticketing and checkout easy. The reminders and receipting features are great too.
cons: Cons: There is a very limited Salesforce integration, and it would be nice to have more features built out.

title: finding weekend entertainment
name: matthew k.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite always has events that i'm interested in. I mainly buy tickets to beer and music festivals, but there's plenty of other event types.
cons: Cons: I haven't found anything Eventbrite does wrong.

title: I love Eventbrite, but they recently had a high increase in their price and I was disappointed to find they don't seem to care about the little people.
name: Kim M.
pros: Pros: They manage the backend nicely, you can run a check or cash internally but include them in the count with everyone else, also they promote your events and they make it easy to communicate with your attendees.
cons: Cons: They are too expensive and no longer offer a non-profit option, and I was very upset by this and am looking for another option, but no one else seems to have all the pieces together.

title: Most complete event manager
name: Felipa S.
pros: Pros: Social networking integration, tickets selling, attendees management and the badge generator.
cons: Cons: The taxes may be heavy to hold depending on event budget.
overall: Overall: We used it in many TEDx events and courses in university

title: Quick and easy to use.
name: JIL M.
pros: Pros: So handy for inviting people to events. Business and non business alike. We used it for a baby shower invitation.
cons: Cons: Not much, it's super easy to use and has great graphics.
overall: Overall: I highly recommend this product!

title: Eventbrite
name: Angela B.
pros: Pros: The website was easy to use, and I was able to schedule event and send it to friends.
cons: Cons: NOthing, the software never received any complaints from friends and family when I created events through it.

title: Eventbrite is the best.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I like Eventbrite because it is easy to set up for any event. It has a very user-friendly interface which makes it simple to use for anyone.
cons: Cons: I have nothing negative to say about Eventbrite.

title: For all your event needs
name: Braden C.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Eventbrite has helped us host user groups effectively.
cons: Cons: I can't always find the right setting. It would be nice if settings were a little more user friendly.

title: Eventbrite
name: Emily J.
pros: Pros: I like that it's easy to browse and narrow down and it's also easy to post events as well.
cons: Cons: I don't like that it lags at times and you have to go through multiple links to book an event sometimes.

title: Perfectly good Software for online event tickets
name: Sachin C.
comments: Comments: All good. Keep up the good work guys.
pros: Pros: 1) Straight to the point, no cuss no fuss. 2) Stupid people friendly. In short ease of use is optimum. 3) Don't know if anyone giving a competition to this software would survive for long.
cons: Cons: 1) Minor glitches when reloading the page sometimes, but that can happen with anyone. 2) Hardly anything to be said on the negative part.

title: Eventbrite
name: Yiu W.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is a platform that allows you to register or buy tickets to events. It is a great place to keep track of all of your tickets and events.
cons: Cons: Nothing negative based on my usage so far.

title: Great and popular event software
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite has an easy set-up, syncs to other programs nicely, and makes it easy to track RSVPs.
cons: Cons: Can't think of any real cons. Event recommendations can at times look cluttered and be unrelated.

title: Sell your tickets for your event!!!
name: SABRINA B.
pros: Pros: I love that my attendees can purchase tickets through Eventbrite with a fast and secure checkout.
cons: Cons: I like the functions Eventbrite offers and the ease of setting up ticket purchase for my events.

title: Advantages of booking through Eventbrite
name: Luc L.
comments: Comments: Quite a useful tool when responding to an event request.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is a reliable and strong event management tool that interacts well on social media
cons: Cons: Very difficult to manipulate the conditions for events

title: Eventbright user
name: Marla T.
pros: Pros: I like that Eventbright is easy to use and lots of companies use it so you can register for their events.
cons: Cons: Sometimes when you use Eventbright to register for events your receipt tells you the name of the event but not the actual company that is putting on the event.

title: Quick response for all your guests, convenient and friendly
name: Natalya (Natasha) P.
pros: Pros: User-friendly, and doesn't require much time to get started. Great for invitees to be able to see who else is going.
cons: Cons: Layouts are a little too busy, may benefit from some prioritization.

title: Works for the events i need to create!
name: Scott K.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is an easy to use event hosting program. Having used it as an attendee for a lot of events, its easy in that regard and very straightforward when hosting events.
cons: Cons: None, really. I havent set up a ton of events using it, but the one thing that seemed a little unclear was how to export attendee's, although i'm sure i just missed something.

title: Great place for event tickets and info
name: Dawn G.
pros: Pros: I love to be able to go to one place for all my event and concert tickets and information. I use Eventbrite regularly
cons: Cons: Id like to see a more advanced notification of events with reminders

title: Great for Gathering RSVPs
name: Blaise I.
pros: Pros: Easy to use for gathering RSVP's to events and creating tickets for attendees.
cons: Cons: I have no complaints at this time. This has always worked well for me.
overall: Overall: Has worked successfully every time I have used it.

title: Never miss an event again
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Very easy to use and functional. Great way to attend an event and have it placed on your calendar.
cons: Cons: I really cannot think of anything that I do not like about this product. It works great.

title: Great Event Management Software
name: Erika M.
comments: Comments: Great product, user friendly. I would definitely recommend.
pros: Pros: I love having a platform for events It has made organizing things much easier.
cons: Cons: The lack of customization in the invites that are sent out.

title: Great for event planning
name: Nubia H.
pros: Pros: Always a great tool fir both business and personal use. Makes sending invites and gathering RSVPs a breeze. I like the added features too.
cons: Cons: So far have. Not encountered any issues.

title: Very useful
name: LASHAE J.
pros: Pros: The most I like about this product is eveything. I can find all event from large to small on here
cons: Cons: There isnt anything I dislike about this product

title: Eventbrite as a attendee
name: Cindy Z.
comments: Comments: I've used Eventbrite several times to attend both free and paid events and it's always quick and easy to use, find events and be reminded about my reservations. Between the website and their app, I'm always connected.
pros: Pros: It's easy to use and always on my phone

title: E vent bright
name: Marcus C.
comments: Comments: I enjoy using this software for both small and large events. Super helpful to maintain communication with attendees. Allows easy follow up after the event.
pros: Pros: Handles customers payments quickly and easily.
cons: Cons: Needs more of a Q&A section for promoters.

title: Easy to use for ticketing events!
name: Rochelle W.
pros: Pros: I love how easy it is to create an event with eventbrite. It also has categories you can place your event so it will be easy for other people who have that interest to find.
cons: Cons: I just wish the overall layout of the site would ascetically look better.
overall: Overall: Overall my experience with Eventbrite has been great on the user end and consumer end. Good service to use!

title: I love Eventbrite!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite makes planning events and ticket sales extremely easy and unfriendly.
cons: Cons: None! I really have nothing bad to say about eventbright!
overall: Overall: Overall, this is the software to use when organizing an event!

title: Eventbrite
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I like that events in Eventbrite easily migrate into my Apple Wallet so it is easy to pull up tickets when the time comes, even offline.
cons: Cons: I have never had issues using Eventbrite.

title: Great way of Knowing whats happening around
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It is really helpful to get to know about the events and register them online easily and quickly.
cons: Cons: I don't see any con of this software. Its a great way to search and schedule events.

title: Customizable Event Planning Platform
name: Casey S.
pros: Pros: This is a customizable event planning platform that has various tools to effectively plan your event. You can manage registrations and collect data from your event.
cons: Cons: It charges a small fee if you collect payments for ticket sales. Because it is a primarily free platform, it makes it not as powerful as some other event management tools.

title: Customer service is very lacking
name: Neyssa H.
pros: Pros: It was inexpensive and mostly intuitive.
cons: Cons: When I've had problems with my account it's been nearly impossible to get answers from a real person. When I finally do get a person, they don't listen to me or read my explanation of the issue I'm having. They've been condescending, sending me to the help page I already explained I'd read through and it didn't pertain to my situation. This last time, my entire account has disappeared and I've been trying for four days to get answers about it, but no one is responding to my request. Guess small businesses don't matter to them.

title: Free or Paid, you can't complain.
name: Henry L.
comments: Comments: By using Eventbrite, it's another tool we use to market to the demographic we want to capture.
pros: Pros: It's easy to use and set up events to promote our Air Conditioning and Plumbing company. You don't have to pay to use Eventbrite if you don't charge for the event, which we don't. We use it to market our company especially now that it's Summertime and warm out.
cons: Cons: No real complaints honestly. I've been on both ends of Eventbrite--setting up events and attending them--via Eventbrite and the experience felt easy.

title: One of the best ways to set up events
name: Fernando T.
pros: Pros: We used this at work when we did our optus end of year party which was awesome to send out invites and RSVP
cons: Cons: nothing was there that I could see that I didn't like. It was easy to use

title: Visible, Easy, and Direct
name: Alec M.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Frankly, as far as ticketing platforms and event organization goes, Evetbrite is exactly what you want it to be. Multiple tiers are allowed, updates are quick, and you have as much or as little information as you need about attendees available to you.
cons: Cons: Cost is not prohibitive, but some competitors are certainly making tempting offers to compete. Eventbrite is open about their costs and you should have no negative experience on this end, but you may not be getting the best deal for your service if you haven't shopped around.

title: The price is good and it's easy to use.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to sell and manage tickets and registrant lists.
cons: Cons: Doesn't integrate well with the tools I use, but that's my fault. So I manually do reporting with it.
overall: Overall: Selling tickets for events that need different tiers and attributes.

title: Great Way To Grow Your Audience
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is a great channel for marketers to grow your audience.
cons: Cons: The commission fees are quite high and depending on your situation, it can be worth it or can try a different platform or approach to save on fees.
overall: Overall: Eventbrite has helped us tap into a new channel to expand our audience. For marketers, it can be a good lead-generation opportunity for online and offline events.

title: Eventbrite is easy to use for hosts
name: Jen D.
comments: Comments: As an event organizer, I've used Eventbrite at least once a month. I find it to be very intuitive and user friendly. They've designed it well, thinking of just about everything. On the few occasions when I felt stuck or had an issue creating or managing an event, I got very prompt support from their friendly staff. I like the ability to "copy" a past event, the option to email attendees, invite past attendees, and so many more great features. The app is also great for checking attendees in! Two thumbs up!

title: User Friendly
name: Shannon M.
pros: Pros: A great user-friendly way to create an event invite.
cons: Cons: Could include a bit more functionality and fun features.
overall: Overall: Great, would definitely recommend to anyone looking to create a quick, easy event invite.

title: Event Bright
name: Brandi B.
pros: Pros: This software makes sharing events & receiving feedback quick & easy.
cons: Cons: Nothing, this software has been helpful in scheduling employee events.

title: Good app for events
name: Murtatha A.
comments: Comments: Great. Application for creating free events User friendly

title: Easy event
name: Angelina D.
comments: Comments: Easy to use and for every type of event you want to organize.

title: My Events are no longer stressfull!
name: Sunny N.
pros: Pros: Easy to use, all in one place, saves paper- I send a link now! Saves me money on supplies. I am in love.
cons: Cons: I really don't have a negative to say. It does what I want it to do.

title: Great way to advertise your events!
name: Shashu A.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: Many people check event brite locally. I first found out about it when I was searching for wedding events. You can find meetup style events there, family, wedding, concerts, local meet and greets and more! As a user on both ends, it's very user friendly. Posting events is pretty easy. They take a percentage of your ticket sales if you're charging. its free for free though.
cons: Cons: They take some percentage of your ticket sales. I feel like it should be one or the other. Not fee on-top of fee. But, that's just my opinion.

title: Eventbrite Review
name: Robert M.
pros:
Pros: Quick and easy sign up

Ticket promoting

Ticket purchasing

Email reminders

Check In
cons:
Cons: They don't have a chat option for customer service

Interface could be a bit more user friendly

Search functionality
overall: Overall: We use this service at my office to invite and handle the registration for company hosted events/conferences (100-500 people depending on the event). The registration form is able to be customized which allows us to list accommodations, transportation and even include dietary requirements for attendees. We are satisfied with the ease of use of the application/software.

title: Great for Parent Events
name: Sara W.
pros: Pros: We used this for our family orientation and it was very easy to use. We were able to track all tickets purchased!
cons: Cons: It was challenging send out new invites for the same event.

title: Eventbrite
name: Jennifer R.
pros: Pros: Great way to get tickets quick for events
cons: Cons: had a few issues with buying tickets prior to event maybe a glitch in the system
overall: Overall: Overall love the software great and fast way to get tickets for events

title: Great event planning tool!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: This tool is great. Our company doesn't hold that many events, so a big elaborate tool is not something we need. This is great for the 2-3 events per year we hold. Our clients get the link and it has the event details and rsvp all there for them to have and us to see. It's also a great resource to suggest our employees going networking events
cons: Cons: I haven't run into that many issues. The tool is great. The only issues is when we do run into issues there support is a bit slow

title: Absolutely Incredible for Conferences/Shows
name: Michael S.
pros: Pros: How easy this application is to use! It seems to be the top competitor in regards to event planning, as it's very well integrated into so many other applications. Booking is easy and you are notified well in advance with tickets and event details.
cons: Cons: Navigation could be a little bit more intuitive.
overall: Overall: Wouldn't use any other app.

title: Eventbrite - Event looking and ticket managing app
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It's really easy to find events and concerts near your location, the app makes it easy to search and select and buy tickets
cons: Cons: Too many reminders auto-configured into the app

title: Selling tickets? This is a must consider app
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to setup, one of the first that I have used and has improved over time
cons: Cons: Scheduling design needs work. I like Sched better for that, but they are integrated with each other.

title: Such a wonderful online-event registration tool!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: We love using Eventbrite when sending out RSVPs to candidates and clients for our company events. The platform is easy to set up on the back end, aesthetically pleasing, and easy to use for candidates/clients RSVP'ing to events.
cons: Cons: I do not have any issues with Eventbrite. It is our go-to platform when scheduling events.

title: Great for creating events for SXSW!
name: Jonathan J.
comments: Comments: Easy to use event creation and management software. Great for free events, and the fees they charge for paid events is worth it!
pros: Pros: Great UI for attendees to register.
cons: Cons: Does not integrate into other CRMs as tightly as we would like.

title: Perfect to Create & Attend Events
name: Jamiee D.
pros: Pros: This software is easy to use, simply type in your zipcode and see events registered on the software in your area. I've purchased tickets via it simply and it only took a matter of seconds.
cons: Cons: There was a surcharge to purchase tickets for an event I attended when buying via this software that seemed unnecessary. Also while using a particular event in my area did not show during the display of local events (it was not a private event either) however I found it via the search feature.

title: Great event registration platform
name: Keith B.
pros: Pros: Very easy to use and setup, whether you are a SMB or Enterprise. Also have nice mobile options as well.
cons: Cons: Not many cons. They continue to roll out features that make it better.

title: Easiest Ticket Buying Site
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It is easy for the seller and the buyer to use to buy tickets to events and issue refunds.
cons: Cons: It can be tedious to keep signing in if you make an account and forget a password.

title: It does everything you want it to, for a price
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is highly flexible. It can do almost anything you want it to, but most of the things you want it to do will be for an added price.
cons: Cons: I primarily use this for ticketing for non-profit fundraising. The percentage of fees is pretty steep, in my opinion. I wish there were a way to create a non-profit account for lower fees.

title: Concert Tickets
name: Chaka G.
pros: Pros: I like that I can pull the app up on my phone when I go to a concert and don't have to worry about printing out my tickets!
cons: Cons: None...great software I have no complaints!

title: Eventbrite Changed The Game
name: Gregory D.
comments: Comments: Fantastic!
pros: Pros: Eventbrite makes obtaining tickets to events super easy and simple. I am an iPhone user and when I purchase tickets through Eventbrite, I am able to easily and instantly add the tickets to my Apple Wallet. This allows me to avoid thinking about printing them or having to have connectivity to show my ticket at the door.
cons: Cons: The only thing I don't like is that the once the tickets are added to my Apple Wallet, there should be more information listed on the ticket.

title: Excellent tool for event planlning
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to use tool that allows for decent customization. We used this tool to plan and invite users to our 20 year high school reunion and everyone was able to easily manage and navigate through the app.
cons: Cons: Upon first sign-up I received several emails and adds to use the site again which ultimately led me to unsubscribe.

title: Event Success
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy to promote and sell things for business or personal use through convenient registration links.
cons: Cons: Nothing! I have not found any other that could replace this one.

title: Never have to worry about events.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Great software. Intuitive. Not only for pre events but also for post events.
cons: Cons: Haven't found anything off-putting at least so far.

title: LOVE IT
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Super easy for setting up ticketing for events. Integrating for sharing on social media is a cinch. Easy to find other events in your area as well!
cons: Cons: Nothing I can think of as of yet, the software is well built out.
overall: Overall: Great. Would definitely recommend using it if you don't want the hassle of having to ticket individuals yourself for an event your hosting

title: Brilliant event manager
name: Amanda M.
pros: Pros: I purchased many event tickets through this website as it is easy to navigate through and offers many events
cons: Cons: The costumer service is very hard to get in touch with

title: easy
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: so great that the tickets and entry items are so convenient on my phone
cons: Cons: had some cellular issues with downloading tix. but realized you can download so it was resolved!

title: Really great way to organize an Event
name: Kate M.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I have not used Eventbrite very much at this point, but organizing events is slowly becoming a larger part of my job, and Eventbrite is becoming a crucial part of this process. It's user friendly, easy to use and a clean interface. I love it!
cons: Cons: Some of the features are a little bit rigid, so depending on what you need to do, it might not work, or might be difficult to organize the event the way you would like. I have had to organized only very basic events though, so I have not run into much trouble at all.

title: not too good if you all about conversion
name: gil m.
comments: Comments: Eventribe give you almost no other option but paypal. On the mobile site there is a big button of check out with paypal... but what about if you dont have paypal? only after you click the button of paypal you will then see another option to pay with debit or credit... not good if you all about conversion

title: LOVE!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: I love how easy it is to customize, set-up, and manage events. Any issue or question I've had, I've been able to look up online to get resolved quickly.
cons: Cons: I wish I could access more of the features through a free account, but don't we all? If I used it more, I'd definitely spring for the upgraded account.
overall: Overall: Convenient way to manage attendees!

title: Excelent way to organize your events!
name: Victor D.
pros: Pros: Great option if you want to organize your personal or professional event.
cons: Cons: Not much; I think is the best service out there for event manage and planning
overall: Overall: Awesome product.

title: Great service
name: Bart W.
pros: Pros: I love the ease of keeping track of my tickets
cons: Cons: I honestly love this app. A dark mode would be appreciated.
overall: Overall: I love the ease of use and the ability to add my events to my calendar.

title: Right on time!
name: john t.
pros: Pros: I was able to RSVP and receive my tickets to an event with a simple click
cons: Cons: It would be cool to also use as a personal planner

title: Eventbrite is for Everyone!
name: Jill R.
pros: Pros: Very easy to use. You can pass the service charge to attendees. Great way to send updates to all attendees.
cons: Cons: Can't think of a single "con". This is a great app!

title: I use Eventbrite for signing up for events.
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: It's good for signing up for events and that's about it. There's not much else that I'd recommend about this product.
cons: Cons: I do not like the email reminders when signing up for an event. It could be much less invasive in my inbox.

title: Easy to use
name: Alessandro P.
comments: Comments: Overall a good helper to organize your events!
pros: Pros: I love using Eventbrite because it is easy to use and makes your life easier when it comes to send multiple invitations and follow-up with each of them.
cons: Cons: It takes a couple of minutes to adapt to the software and to configure the body, text and users, but nothing too much to stress.

title: Great ticketing software
name: Lauren E.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: I love how easy it is to set up events, customize verbiage, and change or add payment settings. It is very intuitive, and it's a brand and system that's become more well-known and wide-spread where customers trust the system and secure payment checkout platform to be able to purchase without any worries.
cons: Cons: I wish I could customize the landing page more with different fonts, colors, and adding photo layouts. The option to be able to have a spotify streaming widget embeded would be great too.
overall: Overall: ease of setting up events

title: Simple and to the point
name: Diego Y.
pros: Pros: Eventbrite is easy for both the administrator setting up an event and a user who is going to the event.
cons: Cons: Nothing, the software is simple and right to the point.

title: Great idea!
name: Mia Irene L.
pros: Pros: You can promote your event easily by using this software. It's easy to use! Plus, it sends reminders through email.
cons: Cons: If there could be more options for design.

title: Eventbrite
name: Jennifer S.
pros: Pros: This software provides an effective way to create and respond to events.
cons: Cons: While the software is neat and clear in appearance, it also appears overly simplistic.

title: Eventbrite has been super wonderful!!!
name: Chad F.
comments: Comments: Eventbrite has been so wonderful for my fitness startup! I am not a tech person at all, but I have found the site easy to navigate in order to create appealing and effective event and registration pages! It is very very user friendly and has helped create a community for my customers! My only bit of advice is that it takes a bit of time for tech support to respond to questions submitted online. Other than that my relationship and experience with Eventbrite has been quite wonderful!

title: Easy to set up events and all of your guests
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The ease of ability to set up an event and all of your guests, really simple.
cons: Cons: It does provide a lot of ads and follow ups on the free version, to be expected.

title: Easy Events
name: Eric W.
pros: Pros: eventbrite is the easiest/best way to find something to do on a popular weekend, the signup is quick and easy, and you can even sign up for multiple events without thinking too much about it
cons: Cons: i dont like how you get stuck on the mailing lists of events after the event concludes. I have to unsubscribe constantly

title: Very useful tool for event planning
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Very easy to set up an event, the mobile app is great as well.
cons: Cons: You have to cut and paste names and emails, it would be great if there was a way to sync contacts.

title: Great experience thus far. Only been using for about 6-8 months
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: This product is key for not only external marketing and campaign awareness but for office-wide (internal) events as well. It has been a great way for us to stay connected in office and promote product outside of the office to reach as many end users as possible.
cons: Cons: I have nothing negative to say, really. I think twice now while uploading new events or editing event information, the software froze or crashed without auto-saving the information that was already started.

title: Staying local or checking out a different city ?
name: Tyler A.
pros: Pros: I appreciate how easy it is to look up events as well as create everyday girls nights, or movie dates.
cons: Cons: I honestly haven't ran into any issues with this software. Every experience either connecting with friends or creating my own event has been easy, efficient and made keeping track of minor details SOOOO MUCH EASIER!

title: Events Events Events
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Great way to get a hold of tons of people to invite them to an event
cons: Cons: I don't like that I can not use it on the wallet app without having to download the app.

title: EventBrite
name: Ashley B.
pros: Pros: I liked that I was able to post multiple events and schedules onto this platform for easy posting.
cons: Cons: I don't like that the process is long and that you cant put together the slides on EventBrite and have to save it from another source.
overall: Overall: Overall EventBrite does make it so much easier to post a live schedule, and its just as easy to make changes if necessary.

title: What a great tool
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: Easy way to create, organize and invite - an event planners greatest tool
cons: Cons: Sometimes hard for attendees to calendar the event or find more info once rsvp'ed.
